author: George C. Marshall

quote: Peace, unity and harmony!
author: Cathy Freeman

quote: For me, peace is a fundamental human right of every child; it is inevitable and divine.
author: Kailash Satyarthi

quote: The only people that can make peace are the parties to the conflict, and just as they are responsible for the conflict and its consequences, so should they be given responsibility and recognition for the peace.
author: Martti Ahtisaari

quote: Many African leaders refuse to send their troops on peace keeping missions abroad because they probably need their armies to intimidate their own populations.
author: Kofi Annan

quote: If I were asked to name the chief benefit of the house, I should say: the house shelters day-dreaming, the house protects the dreamer, the house allows one to dream in peace.
author: Gaston Bachelard

quote: Nothing is more conducive to peace of mind than not having any opinion at all.
author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quote: We all want peace. Unfortunately, there are times when peace must be defended by fighting terror and tyranny.
author: James H. Douglas, Jr.

quote: There is a criterion by which you can judge whether the thoughts you are thinking and the things you are doing are right for you. The criterion is: Have they brought you inner peace?
author: Peace Pilgrim

quote: The peace and justice movement has to expand and not run away from the plight of gang members.
author: Tom Hayden

quote: We would fight not for the political future of a distant city, rather for principles whose destruction would ruin the possibility of peace and security for the peoples of the earth.
author: Neville Chamberlain

quote: The years of the economic depression have been years of political reaction, and that is why the economic crisis has generated a world peace crisis.
author: Arthur Henderson

quote: To solve the problem of organizing world peace we must establish world law and order.
author: Arthur Henderson

quote: There are two traditions in Northern Ireland. There are two main religious denominations. But there is only one true moral denomination. And it wants peace.
author: David Trimble

quote: Let peace, descending from her native heaven, bid her olives spring amidst the joyful nations; and plenty, in league with commerce, scatter blessings from her copious hand!
author: Daniel Boone

quote: I am grateful for the opportunities I have been given to participate in that work as a representative of my country, Canada, whose people have, I think, shown their devotion to peace.
author: Lester B. Pearson

quote: For Pleasure, Delight, Peace and Felicity live in method and temperance.
author: Margaret Cavendish

quote: There can be no peace in the world so long as a large proportion of the population lack the necessities of life and believe that a change of the political and economic system will make them available. World peace must be based on world plenty.
author: John Boyd Orr

quote: All of us deserve a greater peace of mind, knowing that our children are better protected wherever they are.
author: Bob Ney

quote: One can not reflect in streaming water. Only those who know internal peace can give it to others.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: We receive His peace when we ask Him for it. We keep His peace by extending it to others. Those are the keys and there are no others.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: In a few decades, the relationship between the environment, resources and conflict may seem almost as obvious as the connection we see today between human rights, democracy and peace.
author: Wangari Maathai

quote: If peace cannot be maintained with honour, it is no longer peace.
author: John Russell

quote: We have peace with Israel. We're actually the last man standing. So there is going to be immense pressure and people asking, 'Why are we having this relationship when it's not benefiting anybody?' Obviously, my answer is you always benefit from peace.
author: Abdullah II of Jordan

quote: When we take our eyes off the whirl of day-to-day activity and concentrate on honoring Him and following in His way, we find a consistent peace that carries us through both plenty and poverty.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: I'm just an old hippie. You know, peace and love.
author: Sherman Hemsley

quote: Bob Marley performed the 'One Love Peace' concert in Jamaica with the two different warring political sides. There's always been that in black music and culture in general. It's no surprise because black music is such a reflection of what's going on in black life. It's not unusual for hip-hop.
author: Mos Def

quote: There is a thin line between peace of the brave and peace of the hostage... between compromise - even calculated risk - and irresponsibility and capitulation.
author: Ehud Barak

quote: As most of the population suffers through life, barely surviving, disappointed and confused day after day, hopeless, wondering what happened to their strong and beautiful country, it is in the media's power to restore, if not some of our quality of life, at least a bit of our peace of mind.
author: Steven Van Zandt

quote: A heartsong doesn't have to be a song in your heart. It doesn't have to be talking about love and peace. It can just be your message. It can be your feeling. Some people might even call it a conscience, even though that's not really what it is. It's your message, what you feel like you need to do.
author: Mattie Stepanek

quote: Although Omaha is my birthplace and the place I grew up, I don't see myself spending extended amounts of time there. I feel almost more comfortable and more at peace in New York.
author: Conor Oberst

quote: I've got to be able to get my time off whether it's just enjoying my house or the peace and quiet of my family and being there and cooking for them. I love doing that. I also love doing leisure things. I ride horses. I love to shop. I love to drive!
author: LisaRaye McCoy-Misick

quote: We are all familiar with the dove carrying an olive branch as a peace offering. The jewelry I've created pays tribute both to the messenger's noble mission and gardens as a refuge of peace and tranquility.
author: Paloma Picasso

quote: Poverty is the absence of all human rights. The frustrations, hostility and anger generated by abject poverty cannot sustain peace in any society.
author: Muhammad Yunus

quote: When life doesn't make sense, we can still have peace.
author: Rick Warren

quote: I like my peace and quiet whenever I can grab it.
author: Wole Soyinka

quote: It is heroic to prepare for war with a tyrant power. Patriots will always win the admiration of mankind for daring to meet the bloodshed of battle for their country's liberty. But the patriot who is willing to go to that sacrifice will be the first to condemn the aimless and secret shedding of blood in time of peace.
author: John Boyle O'Reilly

quote: If the inner world is inundated with peace, then the nightmare of world war cannot even come into being.
author: Sri Chinmoy

quote: I love Miami; I miss it so much. I miss the beach, the peace it brings you. I love the sound and smell of the sea.
author: Genesis Rodriguez

quote: The vast majority of Malaysians are sensible people; they're moderates, they want peace, they want harmonious race relations at home. They look for national unity.
author: Najib Razak

quote: Tolerance, like any aspect of peace, is forever a work in progress, never completed, and, if we're as intelligent as we like to think we are, never abandoned.
author: Octavia E. Butler

quote: When I go home and get off tour, I'd like to have a peace of mind. I like to chill. I don't like everything to be all chaotic like how it is when I step outside, you know?
author: Tyga

quote: Jesus said, 'Blessed are the peacemakers.' And I think a lot of people don't understand that there's a difference between a peace lover and a peacemaker. Everybody loves peace, but wearing jewelry around your neck and saying 'I love peace' doesn't bring it.
author: Mike Huckabee

quote: My new hotels will play a leading role in promoting world peace.
author: Conrad Hilton

quote: Releasing the invisible ties to those who have left you, betrayed you, disappointed you or hurt you, you open up to higher realms of love, peace and joy.
author: Debbie Ford

quote: You may not be able to change the course of government, but you can achieve some peace. And books were the path to that. I grew up in a house where books were everywhere.
author: Ta-Nehisi Coates

quote: I am in favor of a foreign policy that will cultivate relations of peace with all nations, and I will never give my influence, either as a private citizen or a public servant, for war, so long as it can be honorably avoided.
author: Ambrose Burnside

quote: The olive branch has been consecrated to peace, palm branches to victory, the laurel to conquest and poetry, the myrtle to love and pleasure, the cypress to mourning, and the willow to despondency.
author: Dorothea Dix

quote: The cry of the oppressed has entered not only into my ears, but into my soul, so that while I live, I cannot hold my peace.
author: Elijah Parish Lovejoy

quote: A consecrated Christian life is ever shedding light and comfort and peace.
author: Ellen G. White

quote: There is very little room for relaxation, but as long as I capitalize on those brief moments of peace, I'm okay with that.
author: Maelle Gavet

quote: There is a marvelous peace in not publishing. It's peaceful. Still. Publishing is a terrible invasion of my privacy.
author: J. D. Salinger

quote: We're in the last days, man - I truly, in my heart, believe that. It's written. I could go on with biblical situations and things my grandma told me. But it's about being at peace with myself and making good with the people around me.
author: Kendrick Lamar

quote: Everybody knows that love is better than hate, and peace is better than war.
author: Marilyn Ferguson

quote: Our leaders must hear us speaking on behalf of our brothers and sisters in South Sudan. If the moral duty to save lives and work toward peace is not compelling enough to drive decision-makers, we must remind them that we care and will hold them accountable.
author: Forest Whitaker

quote: To craftsmanship we shall add statesmanship in the capitol of peace.
author: Warren R. Austin

quote: When the war was in progress, England and France agreed wholeheartedly with the Fourteen Points. As soon as the war was won, England, France, and Italy tried to frustrate Wilson's program because it was in conflict with their imperialist policies. As a consequence, the Peace Treaty was one of the most unequal treaties ever negotiated in history.
author: Sun Yat-sen

quote: Some men know that a light touch of the tongue, running from a woman's toes to her ears, lingering in the softest way possible in various places in between, given often enough and sincerely enough, would add immeasurably to world peace.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: Peace and not war is the father of all things.
author: Ludwig von Mises

quote: Money can come and go, and fame comes and goes. Peace of mind and a relationship with God is far more important, so this is the precedent that we've set in our lives. The bottom line is, we all die, so Jesus is the answer.
author: Phil Robertson

quote: If they want peace, nations should avoid the pin-pricks that precede cannon shots.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: All my life, I have maintained that the people of the world can learn to live together in peace if they are not brought up in prejudice.
author: Josephine Baker

quote: The idea that the EU is somehow the guarantor of peace on the continent - that is in itself rash, in my view, and risks undermining the vital role of Nato.
author: Boris Johnson

quote: Peace will be when you accept it in your heart.
author: Hiawatha

quote: Peace is our gift to each other.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: The very first lesson that I learnt from the Qur'an was the message of unity and peace.
author: Cat Stevens

quote: The Palestinians want a state, but they have to give peace in return. What they're trying to do in the United Nations is to get a state without giving Israel peace or giving Israel peace and security. And I think that's, that's wrong. That should not succeed. That should, that should fail.
author: Benjamin Netanyahu

quote: When your soul is resting, your emotions are okay, your mind is okay, and your will is at peace with God, not resisting what He's doing.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: We on our part will stick to our independent foreign policy of peace, acting forever as a strong defender of world peace and a persistent proponent of common development.
author: Jinato Hu

quote: You can find peace amidst the storms that threaten you.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: At the end of the day, Wonder Woman is a peace seeker. But when fight arrives, she can fight. She's a warrior, and she enjoys the adrenaline of the fight.
author: Gal Gadot

quote: My heritage has been my grounding, and it has brought me peace.
author: Maureen O'Hara

quote: The quiet rhythmic monotone of the wall of logs fills one with the rustic peace of a secluded nook in the woods.
author: Gustav Stickley

quote: It isn't enough to talk about peace. One must believe in it. And it isn't enough to believe in it. One must work at it.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Let us not deceive ourselves we must elect world peace or world destruction.
author: Bernard Baruch

quote: Let love flow so that it cleanses the world. Then man can live in peace, instead of the state of turmoil he has created through his past ways of life, with all those material interests and earthly ambitions.
author: Sai Baba

quote: The Nobel Peace Prize opened up a door in my heart.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: The European Union is the world's most successful invention for advancing peace.
author: John Bruton

quote: We will not learn how to live together in peace by killing each other's children.
author: Jimmy Carter

quote: Our object should be peace within, and peace without. We want to live peacefully and maintain cordial friendly relations with our immediate neighbours and with the world at large.
author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: The people of the world genuinely want peace. Some day the leaders of the world are going to have to give in and give it to them.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: I want to see peace in the country.
author: Bhumibol Adulyadej

quote: Guilt for being rich, and guilt thinking that perhaps love and peace isn't enough and you have to go and get shot or something.
author: John Lennon

quote: You do indeed have a past, but not now! And, yes, you have a future, but not now! You can consume your now with thoughts of 'then' and 'maybe,' but that will keep you from the inner peace you could experience.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: What we need is Star Peace and not Star Wars.
author: Mikhail Gorbachev

quote: To be misunderstood can be the writer's punishment for having disturbed the reader's peace. The greater the disturbance, the greater the possibility of misunderstanding.
author: Anatole Broyard

quote: Peace can be promoted by the limitation of arms and by the creation of the instrumentality for peaceful settlement of controversies. But it will become a reality only through self-restraint and active effort in friendliness and helpfulness.
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: In Hawaii, we have something called Ho'oponopono, where people come together to resolve crises and restore peace and balance.
author: Duane Chapman

quote: The Honorable Elijah Muhammad teaches us that God, now, is about to establish a kingdom on this earth, based upon brotherhood and peace. And the white man is against brotherhood, and the white man is against peace.
author: Malcolm X

quote: While conscience is our friend, all is at peace; however once it is offended, farewell to a tranquil mind.
author: Mary Wortley Montagu

quote: There is no way to peace peace is the way.
author: A. J. Muste

quote: Consistently rated the most peaceable of all countries in the world by the Global Peace Index, Iceland has reduced its military expenditure to zero, has no armed forces, and has reduced the inequality gap between rich and poor.
author: Scilla Elworthy

quote: Peace is much more precious than a piece of land... let there be no more wars.
author: Anwar Sadat

quote: Peace is when time doesn't matter as it passes by.
author: Maria Schell

quote: It is better we disintegrate in peace and not in pieces.
author: Nnamdi Azikiwe

quote: If we have not peace within ourselves, it is in vain to seek it from outward sources.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: It's well known I'm a Scientologist, and that has helped me to find that inner peace in my life and it's something that has given me great stability and tools that I use.
author: Tom Cruise

quote: A decision once taken brings peace to a man's mind and eases his soul.
author: Mika Waltari

quote: I would like to end world hunger and create world peace, stop corruption, stop drugs getting to kids.
author: Kelly Preston

quote: Intervention only works when the people concerned seem to be keen for peace.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: China pays a great deal of attention to the Korean nuclear issue. We stand for achieving denuclearization of the peninsula in a peaceful way through dialogue and consultation to maintain peace and stability of the peninsula and Northeast Asia.
author: Hu Jintao

quote: You can only end a negotiation for peace if you begin it.
author: Benjamin Netanyahu

quote: Aside from what it teaches you, there is simply the indescribable degree of peace that can be achieved on a sailing vessel at sea. I guess a combination of hard work and the seemingly infinite expanse of the sea - the profound solitude - that does it for me.
author: Billy Campbell

quote: I always wanted to see people's lives transformed from depression and anxiety to joy and peace.
author: David D. Burns

quote: I believe that the topic of chemical weapons is critically important for international peace and security, and I take note of the ongoing debate over what course of action should be taken by the international community. All those actions should be taken within the framework of the U.N. Charter, as a matter of principle.
author: Ban Ki-moon

quote: I think that American women are further along than any other women in the world. But you can't have peace in a world in which some women or some men or some nations are at different stages of development. There is so much work to be done.
author: Alice Paul

quote: Our armed forces will fight for peace in Iraq, a peace built on more secure foundations than are found today in the Middle East. Even more important, they will fight for two human conditions of even greater value than peace: liberty and justice.
author: John McCain

quote: Bob Marley stood for universal peace and love. He tried to break racial barriers.
author: Wyclef Jean

quote: I want a world of peace. I'm not interested in bombs. I'm not interested in wars. I'm interested in peace.
author: Jeremy Corbyn

quote: Peace hath higher tests of manhood, than battle ever knew.
author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: Peace is liberty in tranquillity.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: We want to take good tidings home to our people, that they may sleep in peace.
author: Black Kettle

quote: I happen to dig being able to use whatever mystique I have to further the idea of peace.
author: Garrett Morris

quote: It is understanding that gives us an ability to have peace. When we understand the other fellow's viewpoint, and he understands ours, then we can sit down and work out our differences.
author: Harry S Truman

quote: Israel is no longer a people that dwells alone, and has to join the global journey toward peace, reconciliation and international cooperation.
author: Yitzhak Rabin

quote: In fact, because of this deep desire for peace, the ruling class leaders of this land, from 1945 on, stepped up the hysteria and propaganda to drive into American minds the false notion that danger threatened them from the East.
author: Paul Robeson

quote: We believe world peace is inevitable.
author: Anne Perry

quote: Even the holy men who lived before the coming of Christ understood that God had in mind plans of peace for the human race.
author: Saint Bernard

quote: I want you to give all these chiefs of the soldiers here to understand that we are for peace, and that we have made peace, that we may not be mistaken by them for enemies.
author: Black Kettle

quote: The plan shows that the twenty million people in the German democratic Republic and in the democratic sector of Berlin think only of peace, and that they are working for freedom and peaceful prosperity.
author: Walter Ulbricht

quote: I have traveled a long road from the battlefield to the peace table.
author: Moshe Dayan

quote: We need new partnerships for peace and security.
author: Anna Lindh

quote: A sign that a peace association is going adrift is its exclusion of other political parties, with whom it could collaborate effectively on most of the problems besetting the cause of peace.
author: Fredrik Bajer

quote: We must join with the tens of millions all over the world who see in peace our most sacred responsibility.
author: Paul Robeson

quote: Peace goes into the making of a poem as flour goes into the making of bread.
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: Martin Luther King Jr. is remembered as our prince of peace, of civil rights. We owe him something major that will keep his memory alive.
author: Morgan Freeman

quote: When I was in the Peace Corps I never made a phone call. I was in Central Africa; I didn't make a phone call for two years. I was in Uganda for another four years and I didn't make a phone call. So for six years I didn't make a phone call, but I wrote letters, I wrote short stories, I wrote books.
author: Paul Theroux

quote: The myth of redemptive violence - Caesar, peace, and victory - is in people's bones so deeply, we aren't even aware of it. You crush the opposition; that's how we bring peace.
author: Rob Bell

quote: I think that peace is, in many ways, a precondition of joy.
author: Yo-Yo Ma

quote: I've made peace with the fact that the things that I thought were weaknesses or flaws were just me. I like them.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: The word 'success' - who's defining it? It's about whether or not it makes me feel good. Four billion people don't have to see or hear it. If I've enjoyed the process of creation and I'm at peace, then what happens next is just entertainment. If mass appeal were actually something, Marilyn Monroe wouldn't be dead.
author: Grace Slick

quote: Patriarchy is a fundamental imbalance underlying society And it's one we rarely address because it's so universal. But as I get older, I see that peace is a product of balance.
author: Ani DiFranco

quote: To discover your mission and put it into action - instead of worrying on the sidelines - is to find peace of mind and a heart full of love.
author: Scilla Elworthy

quote: I was profoundly moved to be the first United Nations Secretary-General to attend the Peace Memorial Ceremony in Hiroshima. I also visited Nagasaki. Sadly, we know the terrible humanitarian consequences from the use of even one weapon. As long as such weapons exist, so, too, will the risks of use and proliferation.
author: Ban Ki-moon

quote: I think people need to know that there's great peace and joy in knowing the Lord - the Lord Jesus Christ - as your savior.
author: Tammy Faye Bakker

quote: While the lab plays an enormous role, research is also influenced by inner peace of mind and one's family environment, depending on what stage of one's life and career a scientist is at.
author: Peter Agre

quote: I've often made critical comments about settlement expansion in the occupied West Bank and in east Jerusalem, and my position hasn't changed. At the same time, it's equally important to me that the two sides, both Israel and the Palestinians, work towards a durable peace settlement: that's to say a viable two-state solution.
author: Angela Merkel

quote: Pope John Paul II was a man of peace, a friend of the Jewish nation... and worked for the historic reconciliation between the nations and for the renewal of diplomatic ties between Israel and the Vatican at the end of 1993.
author: Ariel Sharon

quote: Black people need some peace. White people need some peace. And we are going to have to fight. We're going to have to struggle. We're going to have to struggle relentlessly to bring about some peace, because the people that we're asking for peace, they are a bunch of megalomaniac warmongers, and they don't even understand what peace means.
author: Fred Hampton

quote: In the '60s we fought for peace, when the Vietnam war was on. We were against the cops and against the politicians, and there was a lot of waving banners and all that. And I think in a way, just as they were enjoying that machoism of war, we were enjoying the machismo of being anti-war, you know?
author: Yoko Ono

quote: Now God be praised, I will die in peace.
author: James Wolfe

quote: Love, peace and soul.
author: Don Cornelius

quote: In every man the memory of the struggles and the heroes of the past is alive. But these memories are not incompatible with the desire for peace in the future.
author: Gustav Stresemann

quote: I build a kind of wall between myself and t he model so that I can paint in peace behind it. Otherwise, she might say something that confuses and distracts me.
author: Edvard Munch

quote: Then I realized that secrecy is actually to the detriment of my own peace of mind and self, and that I could still sustain my belief in privacy and be authentic and transparent at the same time. It was a pretty revelatory moment, and there's been a liberating force that's come from it.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: Just as God's love to us believers, his children, is unalterably the same, whatever may be the manifestations of that love; and as his peace with us is the same, however much our peace may be disturbed; so it is also with regard to our being in fellowship or partnership with him: it remains unalterably the same so far as God is concerned.
author: George Muller

quote: The wars don't end when you sign peace treaties or when the years go by. They will echo on until I'm gone and all the widows and orphans are gone.
author: Tim O'Brien

quote: The pageant movie I'm obsessed with is 'Miss Congeniality', hands down! I could quote everything from that movie. I love so many scenes, but I always find myself quoting the scene when Sandra Bullock goes, 'I really do just want world peace!'
author: Olivia Culpo

quote: Together, we will lead our party back to the White House, and we will lead our country back to safety, prosperity, and peace.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I think that people want peace so much that one of these days government had better get out of their way and let them have it.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: I do not want the peace which passeth understanding, I want the understanding which bringeth peace.
author: Helen Keller

quote: A quiet mind cureth all.
author: Robert Burton

quote: A people free to choose will always choose peace.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: There is always a certain peace in being what one is, in being that completely.
author: Ugo Betti

quote: If there is to be any peace it will come through being, not having.
author: Henry Miller

quote: One is called to live nonviolently, even if the change one works for seems impossible.
author: Daniel Berrigan

quote: I believe in peace. I believe in mercy.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: When you can whip any man in the world, you never know peace.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: I think that a strong Israel is the only Israel that will bring the Arabs to the peace table.
author: Benjamin Netanyahu

quote: I would rather have peace in the world than be President.
author: Harry S Truman

quote: Law enforcement officers are never 'off duty.' They are dedicated public servants who are sworn to protect public safety at any time and place that the peace is threatened. They need all the help that they can get.
author: Barbara Boxer

quote: When you find peace within yourself, you become the kind of person who can live at peace with others.
author: Peace Pilgrim

quote: The greatest problem all around the world today, whether in America, Japan, China Russia, India or anywhere else in the world, is that people are not in peace. People want peace.
author: Prem Rawat

quote: A man will treat a woman almost exactly the way he treats his own interior feminine. In fact, he hasn't the ability to see a woman, objectively speaking, until he has made some kind of peace with his interior woman.
author: Robert Johnson

quote: It's wonderful to be back. Back among the mountains that remind us of our vulnerability, our ultimate lack of control over the world we live in. Mountains that demand humility, and yield so much peace in return.
author: Alex Lowe

quote: But he is unworthy the name of a minister of the gospel of peace, who is unwilling, not only to have his name cast out as evil, but also to die for the truths of the Lord Jesus.
author: George Whitefield

quote: If there's no inner peace, people can't give it to you. The husband can't give it to you. Your children can't give it to you. You have to give it to you.
author: Linda Evans

quote: Like all Israelis, I yearn for peace. I see the utmost importance in taking all possible steps that will lead to a solution of the conflict with the Palestinians.
author: Ariel Sharon

quote: The choice, however, is as clear now for nations as it was once for the individual: peace or extinction.
author: Lester B. Pearson

quote: The U.S. cannot force Sunnis, Shias, and Kurds to make peace or to act for the common good. They have been in conflict for 1,400 years.
author: Peter DeFazio

quote: There is no greater responsibility resting upon peoples and governments everywhere than to make sure that enduring peace will this time - at long last - be established and maintained.
author: Cordell Hull

quote: Self-Realization Fellowship seemed like training. It was the training ground for finding a sense of peace in myself. Because that's my job. It's no one else's.
author: Mariel Hemingway

quote: I am not saying that I'm happy about what's going on right now in our nation, but I am at peace and I am comforted because I know that He's on the throne. That is good enough for me.
author: Barbara Mandrell

quote: Weird people follow you in the streets, you can't sit alone in a restaurant or a cafe and read a book in peace, and I think everybody values those moments of being alone.
author: Winona Ryder

quote: Any peace process after so many years of horror and terror will be long and difficult.
author: Jose Luis Rodriguez Zapatero

quote: Piety is not a goal but a means to attain through the purest peace of mind the highest culture.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: If a nation wants to live in peace with its neighbors, it doesn't keep rattling the saber at them.
author: Howard E. Koch

quote: Such problems are not solved in one day but there is a great step toward peace and security in the region.
author: Paul Kagame

quote: May the soul of the late President Milton Obote... a long-time member of this parliament, rest in peace.
author: Yoweri Museveni

quote: I cannot imagine any writer who would not fight for his peace and quiet.
author: Wislawa Szymborska

quote: You don't kill your way to peace.
author: Imran Khan

quote: If there are finer beings than German short hairs, I don't know what they are. In their eyes is peace.
author: Ben Stein

quote: Olympics for me is love, peace, united.
author: Jackie Chan

quote: Peace does exist. It exists in your heart and soul.
author: Sharon Stone

quote: In my mind the city of Ariel is a thorn in Israel's side and a serious obstacle to peace.
author: Theodore Bikel

quote: Political satire became obsolete when they awarded Henry Kissinger the Nobel Peace Prize.
author: Tom Lehrer

quote: A peace talk is always difficult, always complicated.
author: Jack Ma

quote: My life mission is to spread peace to the world.
author: Mattie Stepanek

quote: My mother, may her soul rest in peace, shaped my personality; thanks to her, I have acquired many values, good traits and skills.
author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum

quote: Peace is one of the most precious gifts God has promised His children. I know, because for many years my life was not peaceful, and I was miserable.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: I was raised with no religious training or influence. Except the influence was to be a moral and ethical person at the secular level. And to be a peace marcher, an activist for civil rights, peace and justice.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: I believe God's keeping the records, and I believe you will be rewarded even in this life. Somehow, some way, God will make it up to you. It may be He protected you from an accident you never knew. You can't give God something without God giving you more in return, whether it's peace or joy or satisfaction.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: World peace is no longer some pie-in-the-sky thing, because no single person or country is going to solve it on their own.
author: Herbie Hancock

quote: Peace is a gift that is embodied through the Holy Spirit through the acceptance of Christ.
author: Monica Johnson

quote: The Nobel Peace Prize has always been a joke - albeit a grim one. Alfred Bernhard Nobel famously invented dynamite and felt sorry about it.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Only a fighting nation can make itself responsible for world peace, and such a nation must organize its material resources and manpower with the highest possible degree of efficiency.
author: Chiang Kai-shek

quote: While the male eye zooms in on a particular element to the exclusion of all else, a woman's gaze flickers from one tedious task to the next, to the point where we can't distinguish between the importance of mopping the kitchen floor and achieving world peace.
author: Mariella Frostrup

quote: I challenged God. I said, 'God, I know that I'm a sinner. I know that I won't probably have peace until You're in my heart. But I will not let You in my heart until You answer me, why? Why did you take my arms and legs? Why didn't You give me what everybody else has? God, until You answer me that question, I will not serve You.'
author: Nick Vujicic

quote: My first draft is always way too long my books start out with delusions of 'War and Peace' - and must be gently disabused. My editor is brilliant at taking me to the point where I do all the necessary cutting on my own. I like to say she's a midwife rather than a surgeon.
author: Julia Glass

quote: I grew up in war and saw the United Nations help my country to recover and rebuild. That experience was a big part of what led me to pursue a career in public service. As Secretary-General, I am determined to see this organization deliver tangible, meaningful results that advance peace, development and human rights.
author: Ban Ki-moon

quote: It's hard for me to stay silent when I keep hearing that peace is only attainable through war. There's nothing more scary than watching ignorance in action.
author: Tom Smothers

quote: I believe we all want the same thing - it doesn't matter who you are or where you're living. We all want to be healthy, happy, to live in peace and prosper. That's what I connect to.
author: Shari Arison

quote: Political satire became obsolete when Henry Kissinger was awarded the Nobel peace prize.
author: Tom Lehrer

quote: Secure property in hand leads to peace in mind.
author: Mencius

quote: The days of the Pentagon Papers debates seem long past, when a sudden transparency yielded insight into fights over war and peace and freedom and security; the transparency afforded by Twitter and Facebook yields insights that extend no further than a lawmaker's boundless narcissism and a culture's pitiless prurience.
author: Nancy Gibbs

quote: Being a new mother was a joyful and sometimes overwhelming experience - and as the first Missouri female state legislator to have a baby while in office, having heath care for myself and my son gave me some needed peace of mind.
author: Claire McCaskill

quote: I prefer the night to the day and always stay up very late. Darkness is more peaceful, and I don't like sunshine - it hurts my eyes. When I used to live in more communal circumstances, I had to wait until everyone had gone to bed before I had the peace to write, and I still find I can get on with my writing much better at night.
author: Martin Millar

quote: We see a new Ethiopia, a new Africa, stretching her hands of influence throughout the world, teaching man the way of life and peace, The Way to God.
author: Marcus Garvey

quote: We need peace and stability in the Asia-Pacific region. It is important to have political and security stability to build up our economic growth.
author: Joko Widodo

quote: Peace in the world is everybody's business, no matter where you live or what you do.
author: Betty Williams

quote: If you want to be a voice for peace in the world, begin by making peace a permanent condition of your own life.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: We do not covet one inch of Lebanese territory, and the basis for the peace treaty between our two countries will be the international border, which exists now, between Rosh Haniqra and Ras en Naqura.
author: Menachem Begin

quote: I think people used to read 'War and Peace,' and now they don't; now they sit around with their tablets and watch 'Downton Abbey' and 'Breaking Bad' or whatever, and they want the things that they watch to be better so that they can feel better about themselves for watching it.
author: Noah Hawley

quote: Peace is not a state - it is a choice, and you have to remake it every day. It's possible to get a sort of stability, a habit of peace, but it's like an egg balanced, spinning, on its point: lose your momentum, and your equilibrium is gone, too.
author: Nick Harkaway

quote: 'War and Peace' goes down a lot smoother than a Dan Brown novel, let me tell you.
author: Dave Morris

quote: War may be made by one party, but it requires two to make peace.
author: John C. Calhoun

quote: I have no doubts, by the way, that Ariel Sharon really wants to move the peace process forward.
author: Leon Charney

quote: The two basic social identities were Normal and Greaser; although a few sophisticated girls wore peace signs, hippies didn't exist, and while a seminal punk band, Iggy and the Stooges, was playing in nearby Ann Arbor, punk didn't exist yet, either.
author: Mary Gaitskill

quote: The real Likud knows how to make peace, to give up territory, and on the other hand is conservative and responsible. My world view is that of the real Likud that truly came and safeguarded the Land of Israel.
author: Moshe Kahlon

quote: When it comes to matters of war and peace, we must not act rashly.
author: Ariel Sharon

quote: To avoid the trap of Europe fragmenting on the economy, security, and identity, we have to return to the original promises of the European project: peace, prosperity and freedom. We should have a real, adult, democratic debate about the Europe we want.
author: Emmanuel Macron

quote: I'm someone who thinks that the world would be a better place if there was a big middle class. I mean, middle class is peace. In a perfect world, everybody would have enough to eat and we'd be living in security. It's obvious. I'm very happy to pay my taxes and all that. I would say I'm more of a Social Democrat.
author: Denis Villeneuve

quote: Ali forced us to take a look at ourselves. This brash young man who thrilled us, angered us, confused and challenged us, ultimately became a silent messenger of peace who taught us that life is best when you build bridges between people, not walls.
author: Billy Crystal

quote: Peace and security both in Europe and in the Pacific still depend on a balance of power.
author: Lee Kuan Yew

quote: I have to forget in order to find peace in my soul and be able to forgive.
author: Ingrid Betancourt

quote: We can't continue with a justice of vengeance. Peace will require us to accept a certain degree of impunity it's inevitable.
author: Ingrid Betancourt

quote: The only way to find peace is when you are not separated, when you are not fighting, when you part of the whole.
author: Laura Esquivel

quote: My primary passion is film-making. That's the aspect of my life that defines me, completes me, and completely grounds me. Everything else - from judging a reality TV show to hosting a talk show - is just a result of me being a film-maker. I am the happiest, satisfied and at peace when I am behind the camera.
author: Karan Johar

quote: Not one of us can rest, be happy, be at home, be at peace with ourselves, until we end hatred and division.
author: John Lewis

quote: Peace is neutral, and not very sexy.
author: Jean-Michel Jarre

quote: I will try and make peace between North and South Korea.
author: Yi So-Yeon

quote: My long struggles as a soldier of the Chinese Revolution have forced me to realize the necessity of facing hard facts. There will be neither peace, nor hope, nor future for any of us unless we honestly aim at political, social and economic justice for all peoples of the world, great and small.
author: Chiang Kai-shek

quote: This is the way of peace: Overcome evil with good, falsehood with truth, and hatred with love.
author: Peace Pilgrim

quote: We will stand up for our friends in the world. And one of the most important friends is the State of Israel. My administration will be steadfast in support Israel against terrorism and violence, and in seeking the peace for which all Israelis pray.
author: George W. Bush

quote: The great armies, accumulated to provide security and preserve the peace, carried the nations to war by their own weight.
author: A. J. P. Taylor

quote: Peace and abstinence from European interferences are our objects, and so will continue while the present order of things in America remain uninterrupted.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: It seems like a lot of people seek their peace in things. And most of us are not even satisfied with the things we have... we always want more.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Peace is not only better than war, but infinitely more arduous.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Dear God, Please send to me the spirit of Your peace. Then send, dear Lord, the spirit of peace from me to all the world. Amen.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: War will never cease until babies begin to come into the world with larger cerebrums and smaller adrenal glands.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Remind yourself that the greatest technique for bringing peace into your life is to always choose being kind when you have a choice between being right or being kind.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Peace in the Middle East has been on the Obama administration's mind from the beginning. Two days after his inauguration, the president traveled to the State Department to announce the appointment of George Mitchell as his Middle East peace negotiator.
author: Elliott Abrams

quote: The man who can centre his thoughts and hopes upon something transcending self can find a certain peace in the ordinary troubles of life, which is impossible to the pure egoist.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: For me, peace should provide security to the Jewish people.
author: Ariel Sharon

quote: We extend our hand towards peace. Our people are committed to peace. We know that peace entails painful compromise for both sides.
author: Ariel Sharon

quote: American troops around the globe are the greatest preservers of liberty and peace in the world.
author: Dennis Prager

quote: The Peace Corps is a sort of Howard Johnson's on the main drag into maturity.
author: Paul Theroux

quote: I have to admit that I only read 'War and Peace' when I was 40. But I knew the basics before then.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: In one way or another, President Obama's critics will dog him all the way to Oslo for the Nobel Peace Prize ceremony, and even his admirers will continue to have doubts about his accomplishments if not his promise.
author: Tom Brokaw

quote: Ed Koch will never 'rest in peace.' That was not his way. He was always nervously squirming, while making others squirm as well. Comfort was not his goal. He understood that to be a proud and assertive Jew meant never being able to leave a sigh of relief and say, 'It's over, we are at peace, we can now put down our guard and relax.'
author: Alan Dershowitz

quote: I do know that some Buddhists are able to attain peace of mind.
author: Martin Scorsese

quote: As a human being, I'm concerned about the world that I live in. So, I'm concerned about peace. I'm concerned about - about man's inhumanity to man. I'm concerned about the environment.
author: Herbie Hancock

quote: I'm at peace with myself. The main thing is not letting people dictate what I do or what I am.
author: Magic Johnson

quote: Power to the peaceful!
author: Michael Franti

quote: The only solid and lasting peace between a man and his wife is, doubtless, a separation.
author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: The real discovery is the one which enables me to stop doing philosophy when I want to. The one that gives philosophy peace, so that it is no longer tormented by questions which bring itself into question.
author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: If you use weapons of war to bring about peace, you're going to have more war and destruction.
author: Coretta Scott King

quote: I always thought of myself as a moderate liberal, a fighter for peace and justice. I never thought of myself as being all that far out.
author: George McGovern

quote: If you talk to most ambitious people, people who are high achievers, they're rarely at peace with what they're doing because they need an engine to keep moving.
author: Nick Kroll

quote: The supreme need of the world is peace and good will among men. It must be peace founded upon justice and fairness, the righting of past wrong, and the securing of the future as far as possible against the evils of the past.
author: Charles M. Schwab

quote: More and more, I think about the role of the arts, and as an artist, I think that it's important that I share the love and peace.
author: Yayoi Kusama

quote: I feel just fine about ignoring or bypassing the rights of people I have known and loved to be rendered faithfully, or to be left in peace, and out of novels.
author: Colm Toibin

quote: 'Pears like my heart go flutter, flutter, and then they may say, 'Peace, Peace,' as much as they likes - I know it's goin' to be war!
author: Harriet Tubman

quote: My family is the engine of everything, and on a personal level, I feel peace, stability, and they give me force, which is reflected on my work, my recordings, and every time that I go out on tour. They are my base, my everything.
author: Luis Fonsi

quote: Without free, self-respecting, and autonomous citizens there can be no free and independent nations. Without internal peace, that is, peace among citizens and between the citizens and the state, there can be no guarantee of external peace.
author: Vaclav Havel

quote: Ignorance is a menace to peace.
author: Paul Harris

quote: I was caught up in the hysteria during the Vietnam era, which was brought about through Marxist propaganda underlying the so-called peace movement.
author: Jon Voight

quote: We are a Nation of peace and compassion, yet these people have and will devote every fiber of their beings to the destruction of Americans and our Country.
author: Charles Bass

quote: My father was the superintendent of the churches in the state of Montana. He was content in his beliefs. He befit the term 'true Christian.' He would turn the other cheek. He was truly a man of peace.
author: Phil Jackson

quote: If you sing a song of peace with enough gestures and grimaces, it becomes a war song.
author: Jean Giraudoux

quote: It has become impossible to give up the enterprise of disarmament without abandoning the whole great adventure of building up a collective peace system.
author: Arthur Henderson

quote: The forces that are driving mankind toward unity and peace are deep-seated and powerful. They are material and natural, as well as moral and intellectual.
author: Arthur Henderson

quote: Let us face it, the U.N. has failed. It has failed in its mission to promote world peace.
author: Ginny Brown-Waite

quote: I feel beautiful when I'm at peace with myself. When I'm serene, when I'm a good person, when I've been considerate of others.
author: Elle Macpherson

quote: I never will have peace of mind. I'm not constructed that way. Some things in life can be horrible.
author: Julie Christie

quote: But while we all pray for peace, we do not always, as free citizens, support the policies that make for peace or reject those which do not. We want our own kind of peace, brought about in our own way.
author: Lester B. Pearson

quote: I cannot think of anything more difficult than to say something which would be worthy of this impressive and, for me, memorable occasion, and of the ideals and purposes which inspired the Nobel Peace Award.
author: Lester B. Pearson

quote: I just want to live in peace and quiet.
author: Agnetha Faltskog

quote: This enemy of peace in the world today is unlike any we have seen in the past, and our military is learning from, and building on, previous successes while carrying peace and freedom into the future.
author: Mark Kennedy

quote: The business of peace requires more than showing up with paint brushes, foodstuffs and an oil pipeline or two.
author: Tony Snow

quote: As far as having peace within myself, the one way I can do that is forgiving the people who have done wrong to me. It causes more stress to build up anger. Peace is more productive.
author: Rodney King

quote: The Church of Christ is constituted in two orders, the clergy and the people, the one having the care of the Church that all may be ruled for the salvation of souls; the other contains kings, princes, and nobles who have to carry on secular government that all things may lead to the peace and unity of the Church.
author: Thomas Becket

quote: The attainment of the economic aims of man presupposes peace.
author: Ludwig von Mises

quote: Modern society, based as it is on the division of labor, can be preserved only under conditions of lasting peace.
author: Ludwig von Mises

quote: I go gladly to my wife and boy, and I leave this world at peace with every one in it and at peace with God.
author: Alex Campbell

quote: My different personalities leave me in peace now.
author: Anna Freud

quote: The longing for peace is rooted in the hearts of all men. But the striving, which at present has become so insistent, cannot lay claim to such an ambition as leading the way to eternal peace, or solving all disputes among nations.
author: Alva Myrdal

quote: Some people put up a peace sign with one hand. Some people put up the middle finger instead. I use two hands and put up both.
author: Brian Celio

quote: What could become a danger to world peace is Iran's nuclear program and the country's open threat to annihilate Israel.
author: Sigmar Gabriel

quote: Imagine the peace symbol. The peace symbol has three pieces in it. One piece is emotion, that's your body. Another piece has spirit in it, that's your fuel. Another piece has intellect in it and that's your steering wheel. You can never overdo the fuel that goes into the body, which is the emotions and the steering wheel to drive it.
author: Gary Busey

quote: We must all make peace so that we can all live in peace.
author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

quote: Let us all pledge to protect this opportunity in order to see that the wish of peace becomes a true and daily fact in this region.
author: Mahmoud Abbas

quote: Being a movie star, and this applies to all of them, means being looked at from every possible direction. You are never left at peace, you're just fair game.
author: Greta Garbo

quote: Now for my own case, I bless the Lord that, for all that hath been said of me, my conscience doth not condemn me. I do not say I am free of sin, but I am at peace with God through a slain Mediator; and I believe that there is no salvation but only in Christ.
author: Donald Cargill

quote: I like peace and solitude and silence.
author: Carla Bruni

quote: I can see in your eyes, I can see in your faces, I can see you cry. But what I want to say, there's no reason to cry. Do not, in the name of peace, go in the streets and riot.
author: George Weah

quote: I will go on my knees and ask the Liberian people to participate in bringing peace and stability to our country.
author: George Weah

quote: Economic integration is the path to riches and peace.
author: Edward C. Prescott

quote: I am looking forward and I am hoping that I will be the catalyst that makes India and Pakistan live for peace forever.
author: Asif Ali Zardari

quote: When I received the news of the Nobel Peace Award, I could not believe it. I told my father, 'I think they have the wrong name, Dad. Please, can you talk to this man on the phone? I'm busy cooking!'
author: Betty Williams

quote: Peace is not wimpy. It's about sitting down and negotiating with people you hate. Ultimately, all occupation ends, and you have to deal with the enemy.
author: Betty Williams

quote: Someday when peace has returned to this odd world I want to come to London again and stand on a certain balcony on a moonlit night and look down upon the peaceful silver curve of the Thames with its dark bridges.
author: Ernie Pyle

quote: For hundreds of millions of Americans who believe in God, prayer is our bridge between Earth and Heaven, our way of opening our hearts to the Lord. Through this intimate relationship we find peace and guidance.
author: Nick Rahall

quote: When I create an image that helps someone - even just myself - find peace, then I've attained my goal.
author: Evelyn Lauder

quote: After living out of a suitcase for years, it's a feeling of peace to wake up in the night and know where I am.
author: Patty Loveless

quote: I wish the Peace Corps and its volunteers continued success and perseverance. We are grateful for their contributions to society and dedication to providing assistance where it is needed. May the Peace Corps continue its legacy of service, both at home and abroad.
author: Kenny Marchant

quote: As a civil rights leader, Mrs. King's vision of racial peace and nonviolent social change was a fortifying staple in advancing the civil rights movement.
author: James T. Walsh

quote: Man does find in Nature deliverance from himself, oblivion of his past, with peace and purity!
author: George A. Smith

quote: Of one thing I am certain, the body is not the measure of healing, peace is the measure.
author: Phyllis McGinley

quote: If the union between England and America is a powerful factor in the cause of peace, a new Triple Alliance between the Teutonic race and the two branches of the Anglo-Saxon race will be a still more potent influence in the future of the world.
author: Edward Grey

quote: Peace has to be created, in order to be maintained. It will never be achieved by passivity and quietism.
author: Dorothy Thompson

quote: I want peace. I want to see if somewhere there isn't something left in life of charm and grace.
author: Margaret Mitchell

quote: We love peace, but not peace at any price.
author: Douglas William Jerrold

quote: We have to acknowledge peace is in danger and mankind still has not realised the priority to be given to world dialogue versus armed contradiction and bloodshed.
author: Nursultan Nazarbayev

quote: We call upon all sides to stop hostilities and restart peace talks.
author: Nursultan Nazarbayev

quote: I don't know whether war is an interlude during peace, or peace an interlude during war.
author: Georges Clemenceau

quote: It seems to be that when these communist regimes take over - if you look at the example of Vietnam or Cambodia or Nicaragua - that even in conditions of peace they don't seem to be able to figure out how to support their people, and the human suffering is enormous.
author: John Negroponte

quote: Peace is not the product of a victory or a command. It has no finishing line, no final deadline, no fixed definition of achievement. Peace is a never-ending process, the work of many decisions.
author: Oscar Hammerstein II

quote: If the world would only build temples to Machinery in the abstract then everything would be perfect. The painter and sculptor would have plenty to do, and could, in complete peace and suitably honored, pursue their trade without further trouble.
author: Wyndham Lewis

quote: We should learn to live and love our neighbors as ourselves for the sake of peace and progress.
author: David McCallum

quote: A babe in the house is a well-spring of pleasure, a messenger of peace and love, a resting place for innocence on earth, a link between angels and men.
author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quote: May peace rule the universe, may peace rule in kingdoms and empires, may peace rule in states and in the lands of the potentates, may peace rule in the house of friends and may peace also rule in the house of enemies.
author: Virchand Gandhi

quote: The quest for peace begins in the home, in the school and in the workplace.
author: Silvia Cartwright

quote: The Dove, on silver pinions, winged her peaceful way.
author: James Montgomery

quote: If I'm going to be staying up until 3 A.M., it should be for world peace and not shampoo sales.
author: Mona Sutphen

quote: I declare that I will establish peace in this world.
author: Prem Rawat

quote: Be at peace with your own soul, then heaven and earth will be at peace with you.
author: Isaac of Nineveh

quote: When I play with my band around the U.S.A., the most requested song is 'Peace Frog.'
author: Robby Krieger

quote: Every time I'm in Georgia, I eat a peach for peace.
author: Duane Allman

quote: A State in the grip of neo-colonialism is not master of its own destiny. It is this factor which makes neo-colonialism such a serious threat to world peace.
author: Kwame Nkrumah

quote: Peace is the first thing the angels sang.
author: John Keble

quote: In the whole round of human affairs little is so fatal to peace as misunderstanding.
author: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster

quote: This is an era of violent peace.
author: James D. Watkins

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Lighten up, just enjoy life, smile more, laugh more, and don't get so worked up about things.
author: Kenneth Branagh

quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor.
author: Sholom Aleichem

quote: Just when I think I have learned the way to live, life changes.
author: Hugh Prather

quote: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: The only rule is don't be boring and dress cute wherever you go. Life is too short to blend in.
author: Paris Hilton

quote: Life is like a roller coaster, live it, be happy, enjoy life.
author: Avril Lavigne

quote: I'm lucky in having found the perfect partner to spend my life with.
author: Sara Paretsky

quote: Slow down and enjoy life. It's not only the scenery you miss by going to fast - you also miss the sense of where you are going and why.
author: Eddie Cantor

quote: To be free is to have achieved your life.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Life is a journey that must be traveled no matter how bad the roads and accommodations.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: My theory on life is that life is beautiful. Life doesn't change. You have a day, and a night, and a month, and a year. We people change - we can be miserable or we can be happy. It's what you make of your life.
author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum

quote: This life is like a swimming pool. You dive into the water, but you can't see how deep it is.
author: Dennis Rodman

quote: It is not the years in your life but the life in your years that counts.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quote: If you are not too long, I will wait here for you all my life.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I decided to fly through the air and live in the sunlight and enjoy life as much as I could.
author: Evel Knievel

quote: Life was always a matter of waiting for the right moment to act.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them - that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Open your eyes, look within. Are you satisfied with the life you're living?
author: Bob Marley

quote: All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Life is not easy for any of us. But what of that? We must have perseverance and above all confidence in ourselves. We must believe that we are gifted for something and that this thing must be attained.
author: Marie Curie

quote: No life's worth more than any other, no sister worth less than any brother.
author: Michael Franti

quote: Transformation is a process, and as life happens there are tons of ups and downs. It's a journey of discovery - there are moments on mountaintops and moments in deep valleys of despair.
author: Rick Warren

quote: Be willing to step outside your comfort zone once in a while; take the risks in life that seem worth taking. The ride might not be as predictable if you'd just planted your feet and stayed put, but it will be a heck of a lot more interesting.
author: Edward Whitacre, Jr.

quote: I don't regret what I've been through. I've had ups and downs, super highs and some really low lows. I've been so blessed that I could never say, 'I wish this didn't happen.' It's part of who I am. There's nothing in my life that's so ugh.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: Authenticity is everything! You have to wake up every day and look in the mirror, and you want to be proud of the person who's looking back at you. And you can only do that if you're being honest with yourself and being a person of high character. You have an opportunity every single day to write that story of your life.
author: Aaron Rodgers

quote: There is nothing I can do to undo what I did. I can only say again how sorry I am to those I let down and then strive to go forward with a greater sense of humility and purpose, and with gratitude to those who stood with me during a very difficult chapter in my life.
author: David Petraeus

quote: Life is too short to worry about anything. You had better enjoy it because the next day promises nothing.
author: Eric Davis

quote: One of the luckiest things that can happen to you in life is, I think, to have a happy childhood.
author: Agatha Christie

quote: We cannot always control everything that happens to us in this life, but we can control how we respond. Many struggles come as problems and pressures that sometimes cause pain. Others come as temptations, trials, and tribulations.
author: L. Lionel Kendrick

quote: I think it's important to find the little things in everyday life that make you happy.
author: Paula Cole

quote: Loneliness is my least favorite thing about life. The thing that I'm most worried about is just being alone without anybody to care for or someone who will care for me.
author: Anne Hathaway

quote: Instead of trying to make your life perfect, give yourself the freedom to make it an adventure, and go ever upward.
author: Drew Houston

quote: My daughter is my biggest achievement. She is a little star and my life has changed so much for the better since she came along.
author: Denise Van Outen

quote: The happiest moment of my life was probably when my daughter was born.
author: David Duchovny

quote: In school, you're taught a lesson and then given a test. In life, you're given a test that teaches you a lesson.
author: Tom Bodett

quote: The sky is always there for me, while my life has been going through many, many changes. When I look up the sky, it gives me a nice feeling, like looking at an old friend.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: My whole life is about winning. I don't lose often. I almost never lose.
author: Donald Trump

quote: I wish my school days could have dragged on a little longer, or that I could go back and do it later in life.
author: Cara Delevingne

quote: The value of life is not in its duration, but in its donation. You are not important because of how long you live, you are important because of how effective you live.
author: Myles Munroe

quote: Without deep reflection one knows from daily life that one exists for other people.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You learn more about life from watching 'Big Brother' than from reading a book.
author: John de Mol, Jr.

quote: The game of life is a lot like football. You have to tackle your problems, block your fears, and score your points when you get the opportunity.
author: Lewis Grizzard

quote: It's the game of life. Do I win or do I lose? One day they're gonna shut the game down. I gotta have as much fun and go around the board as many times as I can before it's my turn to leave.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Wherever you are, be there totally. If you find your here and now intolerable and it makes you unhappy, you have three options: remove yourself from the situation, change it, or accept it totally. If you want to take responsibility for your life, you must choose one of those three options, and you must choose now. Then accept the consequences.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Life isn't black and white. It's a million gray areas, don't you find?
author: Ridley Scott

quote: Going by my past journey, I am not certain where life will take me, what turns and twists will happen; nobody knows where they will end up. As life changes direction, I'll flow with it.
author: Katrina Kaif

quote: Everyone is handed adversity in life. No one's journey is easy. It's how they handle it that makes people unique.
author: Kevin Conroy

quote: Live life for the moment because everything else is uncertain!
author: Louis Tomlinson

quote: Relax! Life is beautiful!
author: David L. Wolper

quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The sole meaning of life is to serve humanity.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: I used to think that the worst thing in life was to end up alone. It's not. The worst thing in life is to end up with people who make you feel alone.
author: Robin Williams

quote: My personal ambition remains the same - to be creative, to be modern, to stay one step ahead, to enjoy life.
author: Natalie Massenet

quote: Life is a difficult game. You can win it only by retaining your birthright to be a person.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: No water, no life. No blue, no green.
author: Sylvia Earle

quote: Do what you need to do and enjoy life as it happens.
author: John Scalzi

quote: I'm actually pretty shy in real life. But I guess in front of the camera, I focus.
author: Ranbir Kapoor

quote: Don't ever doubt yourselves or waste a second of your life. It's too short, and you're too special.
author: Ariana Grande

quote: Life is what happens while you are busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
author: Sarah Louise Delany

quote: Life's tragedy is that we get old too soon and wise too late.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Weddings are important because they celebrate life and possibility.
author: Anne Hathaway

quote: Life is a series of waves to be embraced and overcome.
author: Danny Meyer

quote: Be thou the rainbow in the storms of life. The evening beam that smiles the clouds away, and tints tomorrow with prophetic ray.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Life ain't always beautiful, but it's a beautiful ride.
author: Gary Allan

quote: Common sense would suggest that having ability, like being smart, inspires confidence. It does, but only while the going is easy. The deciding factor in life is how you handle setbacks and challenges. People with a growth mindset welcome setbacks with open arms.
author: Travis Bradberry

quote: Into each life some rain must fall.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: You just got with the flow because life is just all about how you feel.
author: Post Malone

quote: Give yourself a gift of five minutes of contemplation in awe of everything you see around you. Go outside and turn your attention to the many miracles around you. This five-minute-a-day regimen of appreciation and gratitude will help you to focus your life in awe.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: I always say that the times in my life when I've been happiest are the times when I've seen, like, a sunset.
author: Chris Evans

quote: The hardest thing in life to learn is which bridge to cross and which to burn.
author: David Russell

quote: There is a tide in the affairs of men, Which taken at the flood, leads on to fortune. Omitted, all the voyage of their life is bound in shallows and in miseries. On such a full sea are we now afloat. And we must take the current when it serves, or lose our ventures.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I'm just going to go live life. I'm going to go enjoy life. I have nothing left to hide. I am kind of a free person, a free soul.
author: Caitlyn Jenner

quote: Caring - about people, about things, about life - is an act of maturity.
author: Tracy McMillan

quote: Don't walk through life just playing football. Don't walk through life just being an athlete. Athletics will fade. Character and integrity and really making an impact on someone's life, that's the ultimate vision, that's the ultimate goal - bottom line.
author: Ray Lewis

quote: Everyone and everything that shows up in our life is a reflection of something that is happening inside of us.
author: Alan Cohen

quote: Life is a journey. When we stop, things don't go right.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Life is a journey and it's about growing and changing and coming to terms with who and what you are and loving who and what you are.
author: Kelly McGillis

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Negative emotions like loneliness, envy, and guilt have an important role to play in a happy life; they're big, flashing signs that something needs to change.
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: I think the biggest misconception about me is people really don't know who I really am. They see the party side of me, they see the crazy side of me. But I also have a laid-back side. You know, I'm chill, down to earth. If you want to grab a cup of coffee and just talk about life, I can do that.
author: Nicole Polizzi

quote: The whole point is to live life and be - to use all the colors in the crayon box.
author: RuPaul

quote: I want to have fun. It's a beautiful life. You learn, you win, you lose, but you get up.
author: Nas

quote: The reason I exercise is for the quality of life I enjoy.
author: Kenneth H. Cooper

quote: You can really only enjoy life when you're extremely busy.
author: Josephine de La Baume

quote: The key to success is to keep growing in all areas of life - mental, emotional, spiritual, as well as physical.
author: Julius Erving

quote: The decisions you make are a choice of values that reflect your life in every way.
author: Alice Waters

quote: Surprise is the greatest gift which life can grant us.
author: Boris Pasternak

quote: No matter if you win or lose, the most important thing in life is to enjoy what you have.
author: Dong Dong

quote: Life is a mirror and will reflect back to the thinker what he thinks into it.
author: Ernest Holmes

quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
author: Neale Donald Walsch

quote: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: I'm just a regular person who believes life is simple, and I like a simple life.
author: Manny Pacquiao

quote: I feel like I have a new life and I'm going to take full advantage of it.
author: William Green

quote: Life is not a solo act. It's a huge collaboration, and we all need to assemble around us the people who care about us and support us in times of strife.
author: Tim Gunn

quote: With renunciation life begins.
author: Amelia Barr

quote: If you don't embrace who you are and accept who you are, you won't be able to live a happy life.
author: Ciara

quote: Here is the tragedy: when you are the victim of depression, not only do you feel utterly helpless and abandoned by the world, you also know that very few people can understand, or even begin to believe, that life can be this painful. There is nothing I can think of that is quite as isolating as this.
author: Giles Andreae

quote: Life is without meaning. You bring the meaning to it. The meaning of life is whatever you ascribe it to be. Being alive is the meaning.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: I feel that the simplicity of life is just being yourself.
author: Bobby Brown

quote: For me life is continuously being hungry. The meaning of life is not simply to exist, to survive, but to move ahead, to go up, to achieve, to conquer.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Land is the secure ground of home, the sea is like life, the outside, the unknown.
author: Stephen Gardiner

quote: Life is an adventure, it's not a package tour.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Life is like a landscape. You live in the midst of it but can describe it only from the vantage point of distance.
author: Charles Lindbergh

quote: You don't have to have anything in common with people you've known since you were five. With old friends, you've got your whole life in common.
author: Lyle Lovett

quote: Life is too short not to celebrate nice moments!
author: Jurgen Klopp

quote: My guiding principles in life are to be honest, genuine, thoughtful and caring.
author: Prince William

quote: In life, there is always that special person who shapes who you are, who helps to determine the person you become.
author: Molly Ringwald

quote: The meaning of life is contained in every single expression of life. It is present in the infinity of forms and phenomena that exist in all of creation.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: Haters never win. I just think that's true about life, because negative energy always costs in the end.
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you ever have. Make the Now the primary focus of your life.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.
author: William J. Clinton

quote: My favorite thing is to have a big dinner with friends and talk about life.
author: Carla Gugino

quote: There are more important things in life than winning or losing a game.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: Loving oneself isn't hard, when you understand who and what 'yourself' is. It has nothing to do with the shape of your face, the size of your eyes, the length of your hair or the quality of your clothes. It's so beyond all of those things and it's what gives life to everything about you. Your own self is such a treasure.
author: Phylicia Rashad

quote: Too often in life, something happens and we blame other people for us not being happy or satisfied or fulfilled. So the point is, we all have choices, and we make the choice to accept people or situations or to not accept situations.
author: Tom Brady

quote: Life is like a game of cards. The hand you are dealt is determinism the way you play it is free will.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: My daughter is my passion and my life.
author: Tamara Mellon

quote: Being stylish is about enjoying your life and expressing yourself and your inner light.
author: Tori Amos

quote: The ego is only an illusion, but a very influential one. Letting the ego-illusion become your identity can prevent you from knowing your true self. Ego, the false idea of believing that you are what you have or what you do, is a backwards way of assessing and living life.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: The day my son was born my life changed completely.
author: Treat Williams

quote: Everybody has goals, aspirations or whatever, and everybody has been at a point in their life where nobody believed in them.
author: Eminem

quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: I have my ethics and morals. I have my anchor point of what is right and wrong in real life, but I'm not afraid to entertain any and every aspect of personality in relationship to creating a character.
author: Corin Nemec

quote: Being yourself is one of the hardest things because it's scary. You always wonder whether you'll be accepted for who you really are. I decided to call my record 'Inside Out' because that's my motto about life. I don't think you ever succeed at trying to be anyone else but who you truly are.
author: Emmy Rossum

quote: Beware the barrenness of a busy life.
author: Socrates

quote: Abortion isn't a lesser evil, it's a crime. Taking one life to save another, that's what the Mafia does. It's a crime. It's an absolute evil.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Nobody gets to live life backward. Look ahead, that is where your future lies.
author: Ann Landers

quote: The battle of life is, in most cases, fought uphill; and to win it without a struggle were perhaps to win it without honor. If there were no difficulties there would be no success; if there were nothing to struggle for, there would be nothing to be achieved.
author: Samuel Smiles

quote: Life is full of adventure. There's no such thing as a clear pathway.
author: Guy Laliberte

quote: Mistakes are a part of being human. Appreciate your mistakes for what they are: precious life lessons that can only be learned the hard way. Unless it's a fatal mistake, which, at least, others can learn from.
author: Al Franken

quote: Life changes so quickly. feeling grateful to be around such wonderful people to strengthen and grow with.
author: Riley Keough

quote: Life is too short for long-term grudges.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Alcohol is the anesthesia by which we endure the operation of life.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Your life is the fruit of your own doing. You have no one to blame but yourself.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Brotherhood means laying down your life for somebody, really willing to sacrifice yourself for somebody else.
author: Tim Hetherington

quote: There are two primary choices in life: to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: The monotony and solitude of a quiet life stimulates the creative mind.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I like people that enjoy life, 'cause I do the same.
