quote: I get very nervous whenever I think about it. I've never done a serious play, and I have such awe of the woman - she's really my only idol. It's going to be a big stretch - certain people come out on stage and your face muscles automatically tense and you get ready to smile.
author: Judy Holliday

quote: But I am convinced that those Jews who stand aside today with a malicious smile and with their hands in their trousers' pockets will also want to dwell in our beautiful home.
author: Theodor Herzl

quote: Bjorn was a different breed, I threw my best material at him, but he would never smile, but that added to the charm when he played me and Mac. We were going nuts and losing our mind and he was sitting back like he was on a Sunday stroll.
author: Jimmy Connors

quote: On street corners everywhere, people are looking at their cell phones, and it's easy to dismiss this as some sort of bad trend in human culture. But the truth is life is being lived there. When they smile - right, you've seen people stop - all of a sudden, life is being lived there, somewhere up in that weird, dense network.
author: Ze Frank

quote: I like girls that have a nice smile and nice eyes. I want to date a girl who understands my busy schedule and that I have to be on tour a lot. And she has to make me laugh!
author: Austin Mahone

quote: I was kind of like the Rhea Perlman of the bar. I was like Carla on 'Cheers.' People were more afraid of me. There was a point where I got a little surly. There were only so many chicken wings I could serve before losing the smile on my face.
author: Melissa Rauch

quote: I watched Gene Kelly for his smile, for his energy. Vittorio Gassman for his movement. Clark Gable for his mustache. And I watched Lassie who was happy as a dog.
author: Jean Dujardin

quote: Some people would rather have a lie that makes them smile than a truth that makes them cry. I'm the opposite I'd rather have people make me cry with the truth than try to make me smile.
author: Joyce Giraud

quote: Being in a rock band is about touring. It's about writing songs and it's about making records but it's also about taking a wonderful smile onto that stage and making the people feel good about themselves.
author: James Young

quote: We need prisons because there are some hardcore criminals, but I never met a guy who has been in jail that came out with a smile on his face thinking, 'Right, that's it - now I am going to be good!'
author: Tahar Rahim

quote: I think the divine is like a huge smile that breaks somewhere in the sea within you, and gradually comes up again.
author: John O'Donohue

quote: We're teaching our kids that attributes as vague and relatively meaningless as a toothy smile or a fine head of hair make a fine statement about a person.
author: Neil Cavuto

quote: We have such a long, familiar history with Peter Falk. The minute his mug is on that screen people smile.
author: Paul Reiser

quote: Women do come up to me, and they tell me what they think! I've gotten great compliments on my eyes and my smile. But I don't see myself as sexy.
author: Jesse L. Martin

quote: My mum is great for keeping hold of old classics - pieces of clothing that never age and never go out of fashion. She also says, 'Make sure you always smile - it makes everything look better!'
author: Amber Le Bon

quote: We tried to set up a company that patterned ourselves after Southwest in all the fun, the spirit, the great people, the smile, the efficiency side of it, but we've added some extras that people aren't used to finding on Southwest.
author: David Neeleman

quote: When I see these young girls who are dreaming the dream that I'm living, it's very very exciting and it puts a big smile on my face.
author: Sue Wicks

quote: I love Motown, that whole era. Marvin Gaye, Smokey Robinson. I just put on Pandora, and put it on Motown, and it makes me smile; makes me smile so much.
author: Tika Sumpter

quote: I think ultimately I make people happy: Whether I'm doing the stage show, giving somebody a makeover, or designing clothing, the end goal is to make people smile.
author: Carson Kressley

quote: People smile at me as if they know me. I just smile back. They probably might know me.
author: Jim Broadbent

quote: I don't want my writing to be work to read. My main goal is completely shameless entertainment. I want people to smile and giggle and enjoy the book. I'm not trying to save the world through literature.
author: Gail Carriger

quote: I can retire from football with a smile on my face.
author: John Matuszak

quote: We forget that this music, music made by my brothers and sisters, is still a baby. It's just beginning. When I think of the possibilities, it makes me smile.
author: Barry White

quote: When you see that many people with a smile on their face, then you must be doing something right.
author: Greg Norman

quote: A game one of my sisters will play with me in my first year of being alive is called Good Baby, Bad Baby. This consists of being told I am a good baby until I smile and laugh, then being told I am a bad baby until I burst into tears. This training will stand me in good stead all through my life.
author: Ali Smith

quote: I can sing and dance. I can smile - a lot.
author: Chris Colfer

quote: I smile so much at the theater my face hurts when I leave.
author: Heather Matarazzo

quote: Southerners smile more than other Americans.
author: John Shelton Reed

quote: In case you haven't heard, my girlfriends and I have declared the summer of 2012 as the best summer ever. The best way to document said 'best summer ever' is with a good ol' disposable camera. Smile, click, move on! Nobody gets pic approval, and there's no time wasted gathering around the camera to analyze a moment that just happened.
author: Candice Accola

quote: I have found that a smile and a stick will carry you through all right, and in ninety-nine cases out of a hundred it is the smile that does the trick.
author: Robert Powell

quote: I once called a guy into his own office and spun around in his own chair to greet him. That kind of thing may be why I quit, before I got into serious trouble. I would smile and the person would get so upset. But you do a thousand of those things, and it makes you weird.
author: Al Madrigal

quote: My father was short for a man, with a child's plaything for a name - Spinner. He had flawless dark brown skin and a head full of big, wet-looking curls, black as oil. And he had the smile of a scoundrel - the kind of smile that disarmed men and undressed women.
author: Charles M. Blow

quote: The person that's always talkin', you don't have to worry about that person. The person that while you're in his face, he's just lookin' at you with a smile on his face, that's the guy you worry about.
author: Michael Clarke Duncan

quote: The Parthenon without the marbles is like a smile with a tooth missing.
author: Neil Kinnock

quote: What do I like in a girl? I like a girl that likes me, a girl that knows how to smile and see the bright side of things. A girl that makes me a better person.
author: James Lafferty

quote: Both of our children are adopted, and my wife and I didn't go out of ways to find kids that looked like us. We were just happy to have some kids. And people tell me all the time that they look like us, and that's because they learn to smile and laugh and move their head a certain way from studying their parents' faces.
author: John Wells

quote: While you're improvising, you may come up with something which will break him up. As soon as that smile comes out, you know that, hey, we're having fun.
author: Shelley Berman

quote: I love a good laugh as well, I think that's so important in life, which is probably why I've dabbled in comedy writing as well as horror. I think if you can make someone laugh or smile it's the most special thing in the world.
author: Paul Kane

quote: When I was younger, I'd go to the Museum of Television and Radio in New York and watch this beautiful clip of Billie Holiday playing with a bassist, a pianist and Gerry Mulligan, who was a friend of mine, on baritone sax. At one point, she looks over at Gerry, and they just smile. When those moments happen, it's just lovely.
author: Patti Scialfa

quote: I don't really remember a time younger than 5 years old that I didn't have skates on because all I can remember is every day, tying up my skates and a big smile on my face, excited to go on the ice.
author: Michelle Kwan

quote: When trying to remember my share in the glow of the eternal present, in the smile of God, I return to my childhood, too, for that is where the most significant discoveries turn up.
author: Herman Hesse

quote: Oh, I talk about things; I drive my husband insane. And I can't tell a lie. Everyone knows. I do this smile thing.
author: Cecelia Ahern

quote: I come to work with a smile and I leave with a laugh, and I'm so grateful.
author: Robert Knepper

quote: I wasn't as used to the new dumb questions, so when men I had once thought of as wise daddies now asked me 'How do you write?' I did not try and spill red wine in their suede pants. I would just smile and say, 'On a typewriter in the mornings when there's nothing else to do.'
author: Eve Babitz

quote: I don't have to jump up and smile just because TV wants me to.
author: Walter Payton

quote: I love to see the smiles on people's faces when you cook for them. I love to go to different restaurants. I want to cook because I know this acting isn't going to last forever, and I want something to fall back on. It's another way to make people smile.
author: Raven-Symone

quote: People often expect me to be very serious, but it's not like my record company told me not to smile in photographs, because I was like that anyway.
author: Jose Gonzalez

quote: I've covered a lot of ground geographically and emotionally and for years I lost my connection with my family. But the best comfort you can have, whether you are on the phone or sitting there in the living room with them, is with your parents, and to me family has always meant protection. When you smile you get a smile back, unconditionally.
author: Brigitte Nielsen

quote: Jeff Kinney is tall and has a great smile, but don't be fooled, he's as slick as they come. A real player. And how he came up with a book that appeals to kids ages 8-13 baffles me. He's an unbelievably kind man with a great family.
author: Rachael Harris

quote: I have my own dance and production companies, and acting is my creative outlet. It's what I'm passionate about. I've actually created a lifestyle where I could act for free. I could get a job to pay the bills and act on the weekends to make me smile.
author: Brian J. White

quote: Very few things are totally devoid of any possibility of humor. If you are aware of that possibility and alive to the scene becoming that way, then it just happens naturally. That's what I feel living is like, too. I find a lot of things that make me smile or make me laugh over the course of the day.
author: Tom Drury

quote: In my whole career, I've never seen this type of race that you had to wait for the last day. There's so many teams that are involved. You've got to smile because we're in it.
author: David Wells

quote: I have a smile 24/7.
author: Candis Cayne

quote: My sculptures cause an uproar, astonishment, and put a smile on your face.
author: Florentijn Hofman

quote: Remember that it is not enough to abstain from lying by word of mouth; for the worst lies are often conveyed by a false look, smile, or act.
author: Abraham Cahan

quote: Anybody who knows me knows that I'm just here to put a smile on people's faces.
author: Jason Mitchell

quote: There is no point to samba if it doesn't make you smile.
author: Alma Guillermoprieto

quote: We never respect those who amuse us, however we may smile at their comic powers.
author: Marguerite Gardiner

quote: I do love to walk around in New York because people will notice me, smile, but they never bother anyone. New Yorkers are very cool. I love New York.
author: Creed Bratton

quote: I think the deafness affects me more than I realise; I think it makes me more tired. I loathe parties. I attend, smile and leave.
author: Stephanie Beacham

quote: Growing up, I was a huge fan of horror movies. There's nothing more fun than going into a movie with a smile because you know you're going to be scared to death. There's something thrilling about sitting there waiting for a scare to happen.
author: Ashley Bell

quote: All of the narration in 'Smile' is first-person. Most of the books that I grew up reading had first-person narrators for some reason. My diaries were written in this voice, and since this story is autobiographical, it just felt like a natural extension.
author: Raina Telgemeier

quote: I smile every time I hear that I'm a fan favorite or a teenage hottie. It is a nice compliment, and the remarks from the fans are great.
author: Sean Berdy

quote: I like guys with a nice smile. I know it's cliche, but it's so true! I like a guy with a nice smile and nice eyes.
author: Rebecca Black

quote: One of the most obvious parts of my character is the smile, and if I wasn't comfortable in myself then I wouldn't be able to smile so much.
author: Max Walker

quote: When most people think of Woodrow Wilson, they see a dour minister's son who never cracked a smile, where in fact he was a man of genuine joy and great sadness.
author: A. Scott Berg

quote: As long as I am still interested and curious, I enjoy getting up in the morning, but I can't say I have a happy smile on my face 24/7.
author: Harriet Walter

quote: My favorite books are the ones that make me smile for hours after reading them. I want that for my readers, for the sweetness to linger. Sort of like chocolate, but without the calories.
author: Sarah Addison Allen

quote: Football has to work really hard to put a smile on people's face and not to be so focused on the question of money. Everything is in danger of losing its soul if you're always going to sell out to the highest bidder.
author: Gordon Taylor

quote: Tanzanians are some of the friendliest you'll ever meet, insisting on a welcoming smile and wave as they pass you on the streets, exclaiming 'Jambo!'
author: Jodi Balfour

quote: I like outgoing girls with a lovely smile and beautiful eyes.
author: Corbin Bleu

quote: I hope there have been times when I made you all proud, or made you all smile or at least piqued your interest in this wonderful institution we call government.
author: John Rowland

quote: One study found that people who smile in childhood photographs are less likely to get a divorce.
author: Jenna McCarthy

quote: I collect all the reviews of the films I turned down. And when they're bad - I have to smile.
author: Simone Signoret

quote: I can't wait for summer in the city! I love all the free activities in the parks that become available to us New Yorkers. Yoga and movie screenings in Bryant Park, concerts in Central Park - there's so much more available to the New York community in the summer! And everyone just seems to smile more.
author: Kara Lindsay

quote: I enjoy what Twitter is because I can really connect with the fans and it's a great way to share information with them and it's also a great way to entertain. I like being able to put a smile on people's faces and letting them know what I'm doing.
author: Peter Facinelli

quote: If you're going to kill someone there isn't much reason to get all worked up about it and angry - you just pull the trigger. Angry discussions beforehand are a waste of time. We need to smile at Novell while we pull the trigger.
author: Jim Allchin

quote: I'm not looking for anything more than any other guy. I like a good smile. Pretty eyes. She has to be active, like not play-sports active, but she'll play air hockey, do some pool, go for rides on the Santa Monica Pier. I would much rather have fun with her than do the cool thing.
author: Mitchel Musso

quote: I'm the middle man. I try to keep people happy. I go out of my way to get a smile. That's the way my mother raised me.
author: Donald Dunn

quote: When you're surrounded by feathers and sequins and ridiculous Lycra outfits, it's impossible not to have a smile on your face.
author: Catherine Martin

quote: It's been a hard time to celebrate, to come out with a smile. But I'm an American. Naomi asked me to come out to support other Americans, and here I am.
author: Angie Everhart

quote: You see some of these actors, they have a permanent smile on their face. How can they do that? It really fascinates me.
author: Agnes Bruckner

quote: Indeed it is possible to stand with one foot on the inevitable 'banana peel' of life with both eyes peering into the Great Beyond, and still be happy, comfortable, and serene - if we will even so much as smile.
author: Douglas Fairbanks

quote: I don't smile much, and I never laugh. If you'd been through what I've been through, you wouldn't be smiling, either.
author: Charlie Sifford

quote: I love to see people laugh and put a smile on peoples' faces. Anytime I'm doing that I'm happy.
author: Dexter Darden

quote: I just smile. And they - my opponents don't like it when I smile at them. They think I'm playing or something. But - like I smile throughout the whole fight. Sometimes I'll be throwing combinations and I just smile and stick my tongue out at them.
author: Rau'Shee Warren

quote: Whenever I run into prejudice. I smile and feel sorry for them, and I say to myself, There's one more argument for birth control.
author: Freddy Fender

quote: I don't remember ever deciding to become a performer. I just always was. I began performing by mimicking the performers on the new television that first took the attention away from me as the baby of the household. I continued performing to put a smile on my grandmother's face and always considered her when accepting or declining roles.
author: T'Keyah Crystal Keymah

quote: When I first came to America, you know, I would look at the newsstands and see the women on the magazine covers. I had never seen anyone smile the way these girls smile! It's like they have nothing to worry about!
author: Anchee Min

quote: 'Try Again' - every time I hear that song, it just brings a smile to your face. When you're feeling like crap, and you hear, 'Dust yourself off and try again,' it kind of just puts you in a different mindset, 100 percent.
author: Alexandra Shipp

quote: When I draw my caricature self-portrait, I always do a huge smile.
author: Rolf Harris

quote: His smile is like the silver plate on a coffin.
author: John Philpot Curran

quote: If you meet a woman in a burqa, she can't reply to your smile. It's a denial of identity.
author: Jean-Francois Cope

quote: I was brought up by my father to think that the best thing in life was to be charming, to have a nice smile, always to be liked.
author: Miranda Seymour

quote: Seeing Michelle Obama's bright color choices, and how she made people smile and reinforced Obama's platforms of hope and change, was inspiring.
author: Lilly Pulitzer

quote: I figured out, I guess, that the job just makes me happy if it's not number one. So if it all works, great. If it doesn't, I still go home, look at my kids, and I have a big smile on my face.
author: Thomas Kretschmann

quote: They gave each other a smile with a future in it.
author: Ring Lardner

quote: I am a joyful conservative, unafraid to articulate big ideas with an optimistic smile.
author: Kevin Cramer

quote: As happy a man as any in the world, for the whole world seems to smile upon me!
author: Samuel Pepys

quote: Ever since I was 2 or 3, I loved to perform for people. I would walk up to another table in a restaurant and crack a joke, sing a song, do a dance, or something entertaining, and the 'audience' would almost always smile and laugh.
author: Maxim Knight

quote: Whenever I look at a baby or children in general, I smile and just want to play with them.
author: Odeya Rush

quote: I play guys who never smile, and I never stop smiling.
author: Michael Joseph Kelly

quote: My mom's one of the toughest ladies I know. I've seen her lose both her brothers, both her parents. She's been through a lot, and to see her get up every day and put a smile on her face, that shows nothing but strength.
author: DeMar DeRozan

quote: No one is so completely disenchanted with the world, or knows it so thoroughly, or is so utterly disgusted with it, that when it begins to smile upon him he does not become partially reconciled to it.
author: Giacomo Leopardi

quote: I sat in at every club in New York City, jamming with musicians, because it felt right - and because it felt right and we were having fun - the people dancing and sipping their drinks in the clubs felt it too and it made them smile.
author: Ray Conniff

quote: When life takes me on a new journey, I simply remember the smile my first ballet recital put on my face and I move forward.
author: Andrea Thompson

quote: And History will smile to think that this is the species for which Socrates and Jesus Christ died.
author: Julien Benda

quote: I try to make people smile and dance, not think about things or educate them.
author: Norman Cook

quote: The essence of life is the smile of round female bottoms, under the shadow of cosmic boredom.
author: Guy de Maupassant

quote: The weaker the country, the stronger the smile.
author: Howard E. Koch

quote: From a very young age, music was very much in my house. I would sit with my mom, with the old LPs, listening to The Beatles and Carly Simon and Lionel Richie. The old LPs used to have the lyrics. From there, I would put on dance and music displays for my family, just to entertain them and make people laugh and smile.
author: Lara Pulver

quote: When I used to wrestle professionally, I preferred being the bad guy known as 'The Heel;' you would get to 'work the crowd,' getting them to hate you and want to see you lose, while the good guy 'Babyface' would walk in, smile and shake hands with a few kids, and his acting job was done.
author: Conan Stevens

quote: I spend days on my Xperia logging on Facebook chatting with my friends and family at home; I love listening to Rihanna and Pink and watching movies. Basically, anything that makes me smile, but most of my fans will know that I am always smiling!
author: Dominika Cibulkova

quote: My eyes are different sizes, my nose is too broad at the bridge and squishes up when I laugh, and my lips are sorta funny when I smile.
author: Terry Farrell

quote: I love to smile.
author: Inge de Bruijn

quote: Arnold Palmer has what I call an 'Eisenhower smile'. Those two men, they'd smile and their whole faces would look so pleasant; it was like they were smiling all over.
author: Byron Nelson

quote: When my time ends, I want people to say, 'Man her music made me smile; it just enlightened my life; it inspired me; it made me feel good every time.'
author: Ledisi

quote: I don't hear a lot about elected officials that are men talking about whether they smile a lot. My dad was in elected office my entire life. I don't remember many smiles, and nobody commented about it. He was serious about his job, and so am I.
author: Stephanie Rawlings-Blake

quote: After God and my family, it's surf. I don't imagine me not surfing. Surf brings me smile every day.
author: Gabriel Medina

quote: I grew up in a household without a TV. We lived next door to a library for a while, and at one point, I checked out all the books in the fairy tale section. I remember the librarian's quiet smile as I'd bring back one stack and exchange it for another.
author: Victoria Hanley

quote: Tell me not of joy: there's none Now my little sparrow's gone; He, just as you, Would toy and woo, He would chirp and flatter me, He would hang the wing awhile, Till at length he saw me smile, Lord! how sullen he would be!
author: William Cartwright

quote: You keep shooting. You hope it goes in, and you smile.
author: Teemu Selanne

quote: We're under some gross misconception that we're a good species, going somewhere important, and that at the last minute we'll correct our errors and God will smile on us. It's delusion.
author: Farley Mowat

quote: Someone asked me the other day what it feels like to see all my 'old stuff' reappearing, at long last, in digital. And I had to smile because to me it doesn't feel like 'old stuff.'
author: Barbara Hambly

quote: Oh, the ignorance of us upon whom Providence did not sufficiently smile to permit us to be born in New England.
author: Horace Porter

quote: In masks outrageous and austere, The years go by in single file; But none has merited my fear, And none has quite escaped my smile.
author: Elinor Wylie

quote: When you consider all the stars I have managed, mere submarines make me smile.
author: Charles Frohman

quote: When Fortune smiles, I smile to think how quickly she will frown.
author: Robert Southwell

quote: Action is drama. If we cannot make the audience laugh, smile or cry with us, we are not actors.
author: Sonny Chiba

quote: I really get a smile that people think they have a right to even suggest how I give my money away. I have no mandate to give a dime to anybody.
author: Peter B. Lewis

quote: I always challenge myself. I get out in deep water and I always try to get back. But I get hung up. The audience never knows, but that's when I smile the most, when I show the most ivory.
author: Earl Hines

quote: I will know how to hold you just by the look in your eye, I will never forget - not even on the day that I die. This is a promise of my passion for you, smile at me and make it true.
author: Diana Lynn

quote: We think of stars as celestial beings. And once in a while, they smile at us from the pages of 'People' magazine.
author: A. E. Hotchner

quote: In junior high school, I was an object of pure ridicule for my dress, withdrawal, and asocial manner. Dozens of times, I saw individuals laugh and smile more in ten to fifteen minutes than I did in all my life up to then.
author: Arthur Bremer

quote: A beautiful woman delights the eye; a wise woman, the understanding; a pure one, the soul.
author: Minna Antrim

quote: A tramp, a gentleman, a poet, a dreamer, a lonely fellow, always hopeful of romance and adventure.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: When you look at me, when you think of me, I am in paradise.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Kiss me and you will see how important I am.
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: There's something about the sound of a train that's very romantic and nostalgic and hopeful.
author: Paul Simon

quote: We are each of us angels with only one wing, and we can only fly by embracing one another.
author: Luciano De Crescenzo

quote: Heard melodies are sweet, but those unheard are sweeter.
author: John Keats

quote: Tradition wears a snowy beard, romance is always young.
author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: All the beautiful sentiments in the world weigh less than a single lovely action.
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: Bid me to love, and I will give a loving heart to thee.
author: Robert Herrick

quote: There is no instinct like that of the heart.
author: Lord Byron

quote: All the windows of my heart I open to the day.
author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: When I walk with you I feel as if I had a flower in my buttonhole.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: How far away the stars seem, and how far is our first kiss, and ah, how old my heart.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Today I begin to understand what love must be, if it exists... When we are parted, we each feel the lack of the other half of ourselves. We are incomplete like a book in two volumes of which the first has been lost. That is what I imagine love to be: incompleteness in absence.
author: Edmond de Goncourt

quote: A man's kiss is his signature.
author: Mae West

quote: A realist, in Venice, would become a romantic by mere faithfulness to what he saw before him.
author: Arthur Symons

quote: I have often been downcast but never in despair; I regard our hiding as a dangerous adventure, romantic and interesting at the same time. In my diary, I treat all the privations as amusing.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Romance is tempestuous. Love is calm.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: When I give I give myself.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: I'm a hopeless romantic and I believe that you can find love in many different places and be very conflicted. I've discovered as I've grown up that life is far more complicated than you think it is when you're a kid. It isn't just a straightforward fairytale.
author: Rachel McAdams

quote: My heart is like a singing bird.
author: Christina Rossetti

quote: All I ever wanted was to be a sexy bride, and actually, I think I've turned into a romantic bride.
author: Poppy Delevingne

quote: Romantic love is an addiction.
author: Helen Fisher

quote: Be brave, young lovers, and follow your star.
author: Oscar Hammerstein II

quote: Breathless, we flung us on a windy hill, Laughed in the sun, and kissed the lovely grass.
author: Rupert Brooke

quote: My personal decorating style is cozy, romantic and a little rustic, with a sense of whimsy.
author: Kimberly Schlapman

quote: You feel very romantic when you're in a ball gown. Everyone should wear one once in a while.
author: Carolina Herrera

quote: When I was a kid, I knew the black and white version of 'Jane Eyre,' and I guess I became interested in the idea of romantic love - of unrequited love and the tragedies of that; of what are the important things in life; what should one value over other materials.
author: Cary Fukunaga

quote: The most impactful place that I've been to where I was just completely awestruck, happy, moved is Victoria Falls between Zambia and Zimbabwe. It is probably the most beautiful and romantic place in the world.
author: Hill Harper

quote: It is better to have loved and lost than never to have lost at all.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: I am a hopeless romantic. And I won't stop till I get it right.
author: Halle Berry

quote: It is really rare to find someone you really, really love and that you want to spend your life with and all that stuff that goes along with being married. I am one of those lucky people. And I think she feels that way too. So the romantic stuff is easy because you want them to be happy.
author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: I'm into all that sappy stuff - a surprise picnic, nice dinner, or traveling. I'm kind of an old romantic.
author: Will Estes

quote: Grunge is a hippied romantic version of punk.
author: Marc Jacobs

quote: I'm a very loyal boyfriend. I'm a bit of a joker... I can be romantic, but not too sickly.
author: Louis Tomlinson

quote: I love the ukulele. It's got a beautiful, melodic tone to it. There's something innocent and romantic, and it's just a grand instrument to play.
author: Pierce Brosnan

quote: I joined the air force. I took to it immediately when I arrived there. I did three years, eight months, and ten days in all, but it took me a year and a half to get disabused of my romantic notions about it.
author: Morgan Freeman

quote: I'm not religious, I'm not romantic and I live purely by logic. I make every decision by logic and sometimes that leads me to the right and sometimes to the wrong decision.
author: Laura Marling

quote: I'm a teller of stories. I put bloody skins on my back and dance around the fire, and I say what the hunt was like. It's not erudite; it's not intellectual. I sail, run dogs, ride horses, play professional poker, and tell stories about the stuff I've been through. And I'm still a romantic; I still want Bambi to make it out of the fire.
author: Gary Paulsen

quote: And I don't believe that children are innocent. In fact, no one seriously believes that. Just go to a playground and watch the kids playing in the sandbox! The romantic notion of the sweet child is simply the parents projecting their own wishes.
author: Michael Haneke

quote: Romantic love can be terrifying. We experience another human being as enormously important to us. So there is surrender - not a surrender to the other person so much as to our feeling for the other person. What is the obstacle? The possibility of loss.
author: Nathaniel Branden

quote: French is the language that turns dirt into romance.
author: Stephen King

quote: I think I meant that, given the circumstances of my childhood, I had the illusion that it's easier to be alone. To have your relationships be casual and also to pose as a solitary person, because it was more romantic. You know, I was raised on the idea of the ramblin' man and the loner.
author: Steve Martin

quote: Romantic love is painful.
author: will.i.am

quote: Love to me has meant different things at different junctures of my life. I'm not a hopeless romantic.
author: Randeep Hooda

quote: I've always said that inside of me there is a rocker that wants to come out, but I'm a romantic rocker.
author: Luis Fonsi

quote: What I'd really like to write is a romantic comedy. This is my favorite kind of movie. I feel almost embarrassed revealing this, because the genre has been so degraded in the past twenty years that saying you like romantic comedies is essentially an admission of mild stupidity.
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: I do not like to work with patients who are in love. Perhaps it is because of envy - I, too, crave enchantment. Perhaps it is because love and psychotherapy are fundamentally incompatible. The good therapist fights darkness and seeks illumination, while romantic love is sustained by mystery and crumbles upon inspection.
author: Irvin D. Yalom

quote: I am a romantic fool, no doubt about that.
author: Alex Turner

quote: A boy is holding a girl so very tight in his arms tonight.
author: Edward VIII

quote: Romantic love is mental illness. But it's a pleasurable one. It's a drug. It distorts reality, and that's the point of it. It would be impossible to fall in love with someone that you really saw.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Romance is everything.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: What is a kiss? Why this, as some approve: The sure, sweet cement, glue, and lime of love.
author: Robert Herrick

quote: There are certain romances that belong in certain cities, in a certain atmosphere, in a certain time.
author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quote: I'm very romantic. I've emptied flower shops.
author: Bob Hoskins

quote: When the heart speaks, its language is the same under all latitudes.
author: Ella Maillart

quote: My dearly beloved if I am to die today and never see the sweet face of you I want you to know that I am no great man and am lucky to have such a woman as you.
author: Wild Bill Hickok

quote: I'm a romantic, and we romantics are more sensitive to the way people feel. We love more, and we hurt more. When we're hurt, we hurt for a long time.
author: Freddy Fender

quote: Is this not the true romantic feeling; not to desire to escape life, but to prevent life from escaping you.
author: Thomas Wolfe

quote: I think I'll always be a hopeless romantic.
author: Kim Kardashian

quote: I love to have my hair down I love to have my hair full... there's something romantic about it.
author: Blake Lively

quote: I'm not romantic; I'm very practical. There are lots of fish in the sea; so whoever gets struck with your rod, one is as good as another.
author: Twinkle Khanna

quote: I saw Tequila Sunrise as a romantic picture with complex, bigger than life characters.
author: Conrad Hall

quote: Satan, really, is the romantic youth of Jesus re-appearing for a moment.
author: James Joyce

quote: I'm better with my hands, and I always loved the slightly romantic idea of starting with bits of wood and being able to create something to sit on, to eat from, to store your clothes in.
author: Jamie Oliver

quote: The idea of a soulmate is beautiful and very romantic to talk about it in a movie or a song, but in reality, I find it scary.
author: Vanessa Paradis

quote: If you're a woman and a guy's ever said anything romantic to you, he just left off the second part that would have made you sick if you could have heard it.
author: Louis C. K.

quote: I am a hopeless romantic.
author: Jessica Brown Findlay

quote: Romantic music really stirs my soul. And, of course, I love Chinese music; it makes me feel closer to home.
author: Liu Wen

quote: The gospel sets us free to become the romantic leaders of our marriages without fright or hesitation. Because we have been forever wooed by Jesus, we are now free to forever woo our wives.
author: Tullian Tchividjian

quote: I'm a hopeless romantic. I love love. My middle name is Love. Valentine's Day is my favorite holiday. I want to have a family and children. I am a sucker for every romantic comedy that comes out.
author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quote: I had a romantic, 'Aren't I a good girl?' take on divorce, but the truth is that was stupid.
author: Ali MacGraw

quote: I will always be the hopeless romantic, more often pathetic than heroic.
author: Chris Lowell

quote: Being black, Latino, or Asian is not a genre. Romantic comedies, thrillers, action - those are genres. I think there's a lot of people who want to have the conversation. I don't think people are afraid of it, I just think it's the time to have that conversation. Race is not a genre.
author: Mara Brock Akil

quote: Normally, things are viewed in these little segmented boxes. There's classical, and then there's jazz; romantic, and then there's baroque. I find that very dissatisfying. I was trying to find the thread that connects one type of music - one type of musician - to another, and to follow that thread in some kind of natural, evolutionary way.
author: Jerry Lee Lewis

quote: New York was no mere city. It was instead an infinitely romantic notion, the mysterious nexus of all love and money and power, the shining and perishable dream itself.
author: Joan Didion

quote: I once took the key off my girlfriend's key ring so that I could surprise her when she got home. So I did this whole romantic setup in our bedroom with flowers and rose petals. She was so mad when she got home, but then when she walked in, she was so surprised.
author: Trey Songz

quote: With 'Attachments,' my goal was to write a really good romantic comedy. I wanted the reader to be smiling throughout.
author: Rainbow Rowell

quote: I don't think of death in a romantic way anymore.
author: Robert Smith

quote: In terms of level of difficulty, it would go comedy, thriller, and then romantic drama.
author: Sydney Pollack

quote: I'm always trying to reach a transcendent point, a romantic point, but reach it in a really unconventional way, a really profane way. To get to that romantic, touching, heartbreaking place, but through a lot of acts of profanity.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: I am completely open to doing a romantic comedy, but I will never do something just for the sake of doing a specific genre or because it's the time or place to do a different type of movie. I think that would be a huge mistake.
author: Leonardo DiCaprio

quote: Upsi is definitely the more romantic of the two. I am more laid back. We do have our differences of opinion sometimes. Upsi is always the first one to break the ice after an argument or a difference of opinion. That's what I love most about her.
author: Ram Charan

quote: If you look at romantic comedies as pieces of commerce, the audience is looking for wish fulfillment.
author: Tom Hanks

quote: I don't understand why every guy is not a romantic. I enjoy it.
author: Aaron Paul

quote: I don't get off on romantic parts. But I often think if I had had my dental work done early on, well, maybe.
author: Morgan Freeman

quote: Fall 2013 was inspired by the 1970s equestrian lifestyle. I wanted to incorporate the moody and romantic - intricate baroque detailing and classic menswear elements - with something tougher and edgier in a nod to London's rock n' roll underground.
author: Rachel Zoe

quote: I love crying at romantic movies like 'The Notebook.' I'm always bawling.
author: Fergie

quote: The vampire was a complete change from the usual romantic characters I was playing, but it was a success.
author: Bela Lugosi

quote: I am a die-hard romantic at heart and love the idea of love. But, when it comes to love, I kinda believe in the old world charm of romance - where there's mystery and intrigue.
author: Esha Gupta

quote: Couples without kids have each other, their friends, families, and Siri to talk to. It's not like they're quarantining themselves in an underground bunker, never to take a romantic stroll on the beach or attend a Morrissey concert ever again. They're just using birth control.
author: Jen Kirkman

quote: I had written many things as a journalist, but I had no idea if I could write something scary or romantic or touching that wasn't me writing about someone else's life story. It was really exciting to try.
author: Jeff Giles

quote: Classical, Romantic, and Baroque music, that's what I really like.
author: Joan Armatrading

quote: Without romance, films will be boring. I doubt if people now understand romance, though they may claim it otherwise. I am very romantic in real life.
author: Sunny Deol

quote: I find it incredibly romantic that people should fight for a cause they believe in and be prepared to die for it.
author: James D'arcy

quote: I'm not what you might call sexy, but I'm romantic. Let's put it that way.
author: Betty White

quote: The word 'romance,' according to the dictionary, means excitement, adventure, and something extremely real. Romance should last a lifetime.
author: Billy Graham

quote: If a June night could talk, it would probably boast it invented romance.
author: Bernard Williams

quote: I'm a feminist, but I think that romance has been taken away a bit for my generation. I think what people connect with in novels is this idea of an overpowering, encompassing love - and it being more important and special than anything and everything else.
author: Emma Watson

quote: I'm a hopeless romantic. I buy things because I fall in love with them. I never buy anything just because it's valuable.
author: Iris Apfel

quote: We believe that according the name 'investors' to institutions that trade actively is like calling someone who repeatedly engages in one-night stands a 'romantic.'
author: Warren Buffett

quote: We only part to meet again.
author: John Gay

quote: So the lover must struggle for words.
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: It's easy to get wrapped up in sharing everyday life with a partner. It's fun to get lost in love and romance. It's the best. But holding on to yourself while doing that is the most important thing.
author: Brittany Murphy

quote: I am a romantic, and I think dates are wonderful. I like quirky and fun things. Like going for a bike ride or for a pedicure together.
author: Nargis Fakhri

quote: If I can give you one strong piece of advice, when you go away for that romantic weekend, whatever you do, do not accept or take the upgrade to the honeymoon suite.
author: Gordon Ramsay

quote: The male is always the pawn in a romantic comedy. Come together, break up, go chase her, get her, roll credits. That's what happens in all of them.
author: Matthew McConaughey

quote: I love the concept of the romance that exists when people are broken. Like, the promise of a romance when you're at the bottom. I think that's infinitely compelling and romantic.
author: Shane Carruth

quote: I am a hopeless romantic and I love to spoil my girlfriends.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: The state of New Jersey is really two places - terrible cities and wonderful suburbs. I live in the suburbs, the final battleground of the American dream, where people get married and have kids and try to scratch out a happy life for themselves. It's very romantic in that way, but a bit naive. I like to play with that in my work.
author: Harlan Coben

quote: I'd always thought hurricanes were romantic, with pretty feminine names like Celestine.
author: Mark Shand

quote: Am I a romantic? I've seen 'Wuthering Heights' ten times. I'm a romantic.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: I'm a hopeless romantic. It's disgusting. It really is. I've seen 'While You Were Sleeping', like, twenty times, and I still believe in the whole Prince Charming thing.
author: Jennifer Love Hewitt

quote: You do your work as a photographer and everything becomes past. Words are more like thoughts; the photographer's picture is always surrounded by a kind of romantic glamor - no matter what you do, and how you twist it.
author: Robert Frank

quote: I am not an adolescent, nor a romantic. I analyze objectively.
author: Dilma Rousseff

quote: It's glorious to be able to go onto the Internet and hear any kind of music anywhere, from anywhere, and get it instantly. But there's also something glorious about having a record with a sleeve and looking at the artwork, putting it on the turntable and playing it, there's still something romantic to me about that.
author: Conor Oberst

quote: I like sundresses with cowboy boots, little shorts with big wedge heels and a big piece of turquoise. I also love classic, Old Hollywood romantic styles. I'm 'country girl meets city girl' circa 1930.
author: Kirsten Prout

quote: In a big Bollywood romantic film, taking my shirt off and spreading the hand towards the mountain with dancers behind me are not my cup of tea.
author: Vir Das

quote: It gives me immense pleasure to be trustworthy, faithful, and true - to have the kind of romantic bond that inspires this.
author: Kate Christensen

quote: We are all the heroes and heroines of our own lives. Our love stories are amazingly romantic our losses and betrayals and disappointments are gigantic in our own minds.
author: Maeve Binchy

quote: Romantic comedies are particularly hard to make.
author: D. B. Sweeney

quote: I don't make romantic films. I make films about human relationships.
author: Yash Chopra

quote: I love being manipulated by what I see. I love weepies and romantic comedies where you're reaching for the Kleenex at the right moment.
author: Nick Cave

quote: Mixed messages are just part and parcel of the romantic terrain, and rather than berate yourself for any crossed wires, you'd do better to work on your future resilience.
author: Mariella Frostrup

quote: Great companies start because the founders want to change the world... not make a fast buck. Call me a romantic, but I think entrepreneurs should try to change the world. This comes from working at Apple... old habits die hard.
author: Guy Kawasaki

quote: Those fields of daisies we landed on, and dusty fields and desert stretches. Memories of many skies and earths beneath us - many days, many nights of stars.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: The more we are filled with thoughts of lust the less we find true romantic love.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: Everyone who knows me knows that I'm a hopeless romantic who listens to love ballads and doo-wop songs all the time.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: In short I will part with anything for you but you.
author: Mary Wortley Montagu

quote: I have always been a romantic, one of those people who believes that a woman in pink circus tights contains all the secrets of the universe.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: I'm a hopeless romantic and passionate person when it comes to love.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: I used to try to draw my girlfriends. I think one of the most romantic things that anybody can do is draw a portrait of the person you love.
author: Nick Carter

quote: I am a better person when I let myself have the time for romance and for love.
author: Diane Kruger

quote: I used to be a hopeless romantic - I fell in love with everyone I went out with.
author: Jeremy London

quote: I think romance is anything honest. As long as it's honest, it's so disarming.
author: Kristen Stewart

quote: We must not, however, be like the leaders of the great romantic revolt who, in their eagerness to get rid of the husk of convention, disregarded also the humane aspiration.
author: Irving Babbitt

quote: Consider what a romantic expedition you are on take notes.
author: Anne Boyd

quote: The compensation of a very early success is a conviction that life is a romantic matter. In the best sense one stays young.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Any romantic feelings for a 12-year-old are like entering into a fantasy world.
author: Wes Anderson

quote: I try to speak of a love that not necessarily romantic. I think there is so much love between people and so much love people want to give but it's harder and harder these days to show that, to celebrate that, you know?
author: Emeli Sande

quote: I think romantic comedy, when done right, is my favorite genre. It's just a genre that's very human.
author: Lena Dunham

quote: If I eat a huge meal and I can get the girl to rub my belly, I think that's about as romantic as I can think of.
author: Ryan Gosling

quote: Building a little bonfire at night on the beach and lying on a blanket with my wife under the stars is not only sexy, it's romantic.
author: Benjamin Bratt

quote: I guess I'm a bit of a romantic.
author: Felicity Jones

quote: I get some of my ideas from watching my three daughters, but most of them come from my own memories of growing up. I can remember how romantic I was, not just about love, but romance in the classic sense - the romantic ideals: of honor and truth, of loyalty, sacrifice and fairness. Those were the elements that made a story satisfying to me.
author: Francine Pascal

quote: If it's a romantic holiday, the only thing I need is my wife. We love quiet and calm places where we can't be disturbed. Neither of us likes being in busy places; we would much rather stay in our hotel room and enjoy each other's company.
author: Jean Reno

quote: I've seen plays that are, objectively, total messes that move me in ways that their tidier brethren do not. That's the romantic mystery of great theater. Translating this ineffability into printable prose is a challenge that can never be fully met.
author: Ben Brantley

quote: I have a romantic conception of the writer's life, and the sort of writer's life that I admire is probably a childless life, possibly a marriageless life, certainly a travelling life - I'm in awe of how much D.H. Lawrence managed to get around. But that's never been something I'm capable of doing.
author: Rachel Cusk

quote: I was pleasantly disappointed on entering Bohemia. Instead of a dull, uninteresting country, as I expected, it is a land full of the most lovely scenery. There is every thing which can gratify the eye - high blue mountains, valleys of the sweetest pastoral look and romantic old ruins.
author: Bayard Taylor

quote: I don't want to be typecast as a heroine who does a certain kind of cinema, which is why I experiment with the types of films that I do. But yes, I won't deny that romantic love stories or romantic comedies are what I enjoy doing the most, because as an audience those are the kind of films that I like watching.
author: Deepika Padukone

quote: I am quite a romantic person, really, and I should have put that into my music earlier, but I was probably denying it... I didn't want to be soft because I felt I had to be so hard to get people to believe in me.
author: Billy Idol

quote: A shiny ring isn't romantic to me. I think thought and love into what you do for the person you're in love with - that's romance.
author: Sasha Grey

quote: Surrealism was necessary - essential, even - in the 1920s to bridge the gap between rationalism and the subconscious. It started something important. But by the early '60s, it had become petit-bourgeois; it was too intellectual and romantic, and had ground to a halt. It had become respectable.
author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

quote: Vampires have become tragic or romantic figures. Vampire are largely seduction tales. They're no longer the scary creature in the dark.
author: Stephen Graham Jones

quote: I think the first time I tried to write a romantic song, it was just horrendously embarrassing. I remember thinking, 'Okay, I'm not going to do that anymore.' I think that sort of embarrassed me for the next 10 years.
author: Tobias Jesso, Jr.

quote: My favorite genre is definitely romantic comedy. I love 'When Harry Met Sally.'
author: Dylan Lauren

quote: If you are pro love, you have to be a little bit disloyal to the romantic feelings that propel you in the early days.
author: Alain de Botton

quote: I'm personally a hopeless romantic. I always have been.
author: Brett Young

quote: When you hear romantic music, it makes you want to take your girl out to dinner or buy her something or take her out in the moonlight or take her on a walk.
author: R. Kelly

quote: I personally think Prague is more romantic than Paris. If you have a girlfriend, take her there.
author: Stephanie Sigman

quote: I know most people use their phones to tell time, but there's something very romantic and beautiful about a timepiece.
author: Padma Lakshmi

quote: I'm very romantic and of course I want to be in love.
author: Emma Watson

quote: I admit I do have some drawbacks and limitations as a candidate. Although I am a professional comedian, some of my critics maintain that this is not enough. I cannot deny that I stand before you untested and inexperienced - I only spent two years in television, never as a romantic lead or a song and dance man.
author: Pat Paulsen

quote: I find 'Fatal Attraction' really romantic. I really like the seduction. Almost every time I see it, I'm surprised when it goes dark. I know that's the claim to fame, but I key into how genuinely romantic it is.
author: Shane Carruth

quote: Sadly, people think a guy and a girl can't be friends without something romantic going on.
author: Daisy Ridley

quote: When I was 18, I thought that, to be a romantic, you couldn't live past 30.
author: David Bowie

quote: I find television, and particularly live television, very romantic: the idea that there is this small group of people, way up high, in a skyscraper in the middle of Manhattan, beaming this signal out into the night.
author: Aaron Sorkin

quote: I'd like to be played as a child by Natalie Wood. I'd have some romantic scenes as Audrey Hepburn and have gritty black-and-white scenes as Patricia Neal.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Usually comedy is only available to us ladies in the romantic comedy. That's why I hate romantic comedies.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: When you're in the throes of this romantic love, it's overwhelming - you're out of control, you're irrational, you're going to the gym at 6 A.M. every day - Why? Because she's there.
author: Helen Fisher

quote: To write a novel is to embark on a quest that is very romantic. People have visions, and the next step is to execute them. That's a very romantic project. author: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: I absolutely love Ireland. It's one of the most beautiful places on Earth, and I have strong ties here. Both my grandmothers are from Ireland, and I have spent every summer in Bantry since my father, who is an artist, had the romantic idea 20 years ago to buy an old farmhouse on the west coast and renovate it.
author: Emily Ratajkowski

quote: Personally, I find it romantic not to be with someone all the time; you don't get used to someone or take them for granted.
author: Monica Bellucci

quote: Animals are everywhere. Some are more romantic, like tigers and elephants and chimpanzees, and some are less romantic, like earthworms, but they are just as interesting.
author: Isabella Rossellini

quote: Choosing sepia is all to do with trying to make the image look romantic and idealistic. It's sort of a soft version of propaganda.
author: Martin Parr

quote: You think, 'Musicals, they must always be romantic' - You'd be surprised how few of them historically have ever been romantic.
author: Harold Prince

quote: Bob Dole is not a romantic, at least not an immediate one. Bob Dole is not one to waste a lot of time on metaphor.
author: Jeanne Marie Laskas

quote: In the early days of Christianity the exercise of chastity was frequently combined with a close and romantic intimacy of affection between the sexes which shocked austere moralists.
author: Havelock Ellis

quote: I think I've only done one horror movie, Psycho III. That was a walk in the park compared to a romantic comedy.
author: Carter Burwell

quote: I don't feel like a romantic lead I guess I feel more like a character actor.
author: Matthew Macfadyen

quote: Some have called we rock and roll performers who never retire 'troubadours.' I enjoy this misnomer immensely. While there are many differences between me and my distant predecessors in L'Occitane, I do believe there is a lineage that connects us of the last 70 years with those romantic singers of the High Middle Ages.
author: Frank Black

quote: I was also the romantic lead in The Boston Strangler - I was the only one that lived to tell the story - so I called myself the romantic lead.
author: Sally Kellerman

quote: Romantic art deals with the exception and with the individual. Good people, belonging as they do to the normal, and so, commonplace type, are artistically uninteresting.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: They are just really stupid people in Hollywood. You write them a script, and they say they love it, they absolutely love it. Then they say, 'But doesn't it need a small dog, and an Eskimo, and shouldn't it be set in New Guinea?' And you say, 'But it is a sophisticated romantic comedy set in Paris.'
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Kabul is a walled city, which sounds romantic except the walls are pre-cast reinforced concrete blast barriers, 10 feet tall and 15 feet long and moved into place with cranes. The walls are topped with sandbags, and the sandbags are topped with guard posts from which gun barrels protrude.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: It is possible for a woman to be a romantic, but also to be single and to be happy.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: I love Indian, Italian and Mexican food. And if it's a romantic type of thing, I like a good French restaurant.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: Young people have this almost romantic attachment to civil rights, liberties, emancipating people from oppression, etc. The idea that such oppression exists in this country offends me, but it's able to be pushed and sold because education in this country is so woefully incompetent and inept.
author: Rush Limbaugh

quote: I love romantic poetry.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: Like almost everything else from the West, the Romantic Revolution arrived late in Russia.
author: Tom Stoppard

quote: I think I give the impression of being a romantic, and I think inside I'm quite severe. But some might say they had the opposite impression of me.
author: Tom Stoppard

quote: As far as the lack of hits goes, I think perhaps it's because I've played a lot of different roles and have not created a persona that the public can latch on to. I have played everything from psychopathic killers to romantic leading men, and in picking such diverse roles I have avoided typecasting.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: When I was sixteen, I was an absolutely romantic guy. I fell in love every week. I mean, I was in love with everybody, but unfortunately, nobody was in love with me.
author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: I love a good romantic comedy.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: Even now, there are young actors who want careers as romantic leading men, and the best thing is not to reveal you're gay.
author: Ian Mckellen

quote: The huge difference in my lifetime is that you can just go up to somebody and make a pass. You couldn't do that in the 1950s if you were gay. There were secret handshakes, a secret language. There was nowhere you could go to be romantic outside of people's houses.
author: Ian Mckellen

quote: I'm a big movie fan, and I want to make movies in every genre. I want to make my romantic comedy one day.
author: James Wan

quote: My political awakening, if I can be as grand as to call it that, was all about what was happening around me. It wasn't some romantic, patriotic vision of Scotland going back to what it had been 300 years previously.
author: Nicola Sturgeon

quote: The most romantic thing I ever did to my woman? I painted her toenails!
author: Tracy Morgan

quote: I did send a girl a plane ticket asking her for a visit, I guess that's quite romantic.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: My greatest environments in which I can grow, or grow up, is in personal romantic relationships with a man.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: If it was a great script and a great character, I would love to do a romantic comedy.
author: Andy Serkis

quote: It took me twenty years to get Steven Parrino's work. From the time I first saw his art, in the mid-eighties, I almost always dismissed it as mannered, Romantic, formulaic, conceptualist-formalist heavy-metal boy-art abstraction.
author: Jerry Saltz

quote: When I got married, the Sun ran the headline: 'Here comes the bride, all fat and wide.' Luckily, it was a few days after the wedding - but it was still hideous to read at a great romantic moment.

quote: Having an actual income can expand your romantic horizons toward the more appealing end of the spectrum.
author: Al Franken

quote: I like romantic comedy as a genre, but I think it can get stuck in its ways.
author: Zooey Deschanel

quote: Romantic comedies are usually about when love works.
author: Zooey Deschanel

quote: I'm a romantic, but I'm not a romantic in the traditional sense. I like to romanticize what happens to me. Whatever happens to me - you could quantify it as good or bad - I romanticize it. author: Zooey Deschanel

quote: I am the actor that I am. I do what I do. I've been a 'leading man' playing romantic leads for a long time now.
author: Pierce Brosnan

quote: Suddenly I've got an overwhelming desire to surround myself with the aura of classical and Romantic art.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: I think in general, romantic comedies tend to take one person's point of view, but every once in a while you get something that is balanced for two people.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: I've never been a blind romantic.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: I have a romantic vision of the beautiful delineation between TV and film that existed for so many years. I romanticize the studio system and movie stars as a whole, but obviously that's just anachronistic and probably a non-reality.
author: Chris Pine

quote: My father has been an actor since 1964. Things were tight a lot of the times, financially. It wasn't like a big romantic adventure.
author: Chris Pine

quote: For food to be romantic, it should be light. Too many times people plan a romantic meal, and the food is too heavy.
author: Jose Andres

quote: I'm fascinated by Comte's clear-eyed analysis of what was wrong with modern society, which is that you've got industrial capitalism on one side and romantic love on the other. Those, along with non-instrumental art, are supposed to get you through the day?
author: Alain de Botton

quote: I used to be addicted to 'Reader's Digest' growing up. I would read the stories about love, and I guess that's where I became a hopeless romantic. I draw from that a lot.
author: Sia

quote: A romantic or classical view of the French approach would have been to say, 'It's a French company; let no one attack it. Let's block any merger.
